You write questions, you answer questions and you comment too. When you do all actions like those I said before, you earn points. If you earn more points, you will receive new ranks.

title: Is it possible to get hacked by clicking on a link?
question:
Have you ever wondered if it's possible to get hacked by clicking on a link? I'm sorry to say, but it's possible it is and I'll explain why.

Well, every site has the javascript language in its code, for those who don't know, javascript is responsible for making the site more responsive and making your browser correspond with the site. Among them, a website may request access to your camera sometimes, without you realizing it, because most android devices, for example, the permission is already enabled. Permissions such as: location, camera and even microphone.

Another flaw is accessing links from sites that have the name "Not secure" next to a padlock. Usually sites that do not have the https protocol and SSL certificate. Sites like this are vulnerable to an attack called man in the middle, where a hacker can intercept everything that passes between the client and server connection.

We can't forget about Pharming, which is a type of Phishing where your attack difference is in DNS. Where it occurs we call "DNS hijacking". Example:

Let's say you go to Facebook, and type: www.facebook.com. Instead of being redirected to the real facebook website, you will be redirected to a fake website where your data is stolen. All this just by attacking your DNS.

Good studies!
author: Mohamed Salah

answers.answerContent:
Homie just downloaded Kali and decided to make this post. Bro lmfao

Congrats, you've described how web browsers work. Though it's pretty obvious that some of this is bs (no Android OS I've ever seen has those permissions enabled by default, DNS hijacking is almost impossible with proper implementations of HSTS now), you're very much missing the point. If you follow even the most basic security practices (use antivirus, don't have JS enabled where you don't need to, don't share passwords between services, always ensure you're on HTTPS, enable full disk encryption, don't expose fucking SMB to insecure networks for the love of god), you're going to be basically impervious to 99.9% of everyday hackers. If you're interested in doing more than that, your threat model is most likely going to be more advanced.

Many people lately have begun worrying about supply chain attacks with the recent issues involving say QNAP or Wordpress. Some people worry about their governments, which you can assume has access to the resources to crack TLS. Define your threat model. If you're willing to do that, you'll have a much easier time securing what you see as important. If you're not willing to do that, you can damn well assume that any part of your life that has ever touched the internet is already compromised. Live more of your life offline. And get off these stupid forums.

title: what is the point of trying if things won't change?
question:
I realized that it might not matter for me to try because I might to reach greatness. I might not reach my goals I want, so it wouldn't matter to begin with. What if I don't achieve anything important in life? Then that time wanting to do something was just wasted.

If I try learning something but don't understand, then why did I try to begin with? I wanted some change for things I wanted, but it doesn't seem like I am going to have it.
author: poop

answers.answerContent: THEN YOU'LL BE JUST LIKE QUE REST OF US... ADULTS.
answers.author: LALALA

answers.answerContent: Well the point is that if you want to achieve any goal, you need to start anyway. The time that you do trying to do that, is all knowledge. If you try u have chance, if doesn't, u know.
answers.author: SkyfolksV.2

answers.answerContent: Keep tring when you get a fault
answers.author: Aussie Dictador

answers.answerContent: The point is that if you dont try, you will never succeed. You gotta keep trying. Yes there will be obstacles but you gotta get over them, that is whats gonna separate you from the others. In your example, "If I try learning something but don't understand, then why did I try to begin with" if you're gonna give up, you're gonna be just like the rest. You gotta keep fighting to achieve your goals but also know when to give up. May I ask what exactly is you're trying to achieve that you think you won't get?
answers.author: whitephantomx

answers.answerContent:
But how do you know that if you don't try? Have you tried hard enough? For long enough? You don't get ripped after working out for a few days, you gatta stay on it daily for years.

And after constant pushing and trying, you will eventually see results. It may not be exactly what you want, but that's why we take baby steps, small goals to help motivate and keep going, and keep trying. If you don't understand something, you may just need it explained another way, or you're missing a foundation that might help you understand the subject. If someone is hurting, you can't stop the pain if you don't know what's under the skin. That's very normal for people to learn different ways. And you have to kind of get things wrong to be right, because you don't really know what's right unless you know what's wrong. And why it's wrong.
answers.author: anon3r23089

answers.answerContent:
there is always some meaning in doing something. even if you fail. even if its not the meaning you want.

the point of existing is to be relevant in some way, to be able to say at the end that something happened because of what you did. so never stop trying to do something.

some people say to stop trying to do something meaningful, and try to make yourself happy instead. these people are wrong. do not believe their story. literally the only way of being relevant is to do something.

if you fail, then try to learn what you did wrong, and then try again, and you will improve.
also a good advise here is to be realistic to what you want to achieve. make sure you will live long enough to see it done, or at least to see your part of it done. and choose to do something that you have talent at doing. itll make the whole thing easier this way.

follow this, sometimes you will be sad, sometimes you will be happy, thats just how life is supposed to be. dont stop keep going.

The point of trying is the try a different method every time. If you try and always get the same result then you're doing something wrong. Take a time to think and try a new way. Idk exactly what are you referring to when you say things won't change, but trust me, things do change if you do it your way. Sometimes, I have tried about 20x before 1 success, about 15x, I was like you, I thought I was trying but I was just doing the same shit and renforcing the idea that things won't change. The last 5x I tried differently, then it worked.

Good luck.
answers.author: PowPow

answers.answerContent:
1. Time spent wanting to do something is wasted time. Time spent actually doing something isn't wasted time. 

2. Everybody begins somewhere. Micheal Jordan was cut from his HS basketball team, instead of saying "well, no point now" he grinded his skills until he literally became one of the best. You can look an nearly every successful person and see they all had to begin somewhere. They weren't born with greatness, the forged it.

3. If you do fail at something and give up, find something new. If you're not looking what to dedicate your life to then you'll always have this empty feeling. You have to expose yourself to new things because opportunity doesn't find you, you find opportunities.
answers.author: TBD1020

title: I Want to Kill Someone. What Resources Can Help Me Understand Why I Shouldn't?
question:
As title says. There's someone who has stated clearly, to my face, in my own home, that he has great desire to hurt me and my loved ones. He was extremely aggressive, and i have good reason to believe his threats are real. I don't feel confident i can get legal action on him because so far nothings been "worth" keeping him in jail long enough, no evidence, and his gf is family and wants him because shes that desperate, so i cant really get rid of him like that, and hes not "just going away" on his own. and I'm not waiting to be ambushed on the streets with my loved ones standing next to me.

Idk what im looking for either really. Some book, video, or expression of philosophy of killing, why its wrong right now, and what i could do as an alternative. I could just google "books about killing or why its wrong" but i don't know if the books that will be offered could pertain to my situation well enough plus, i don't have a lot of time. I would like recommendations from anyone who might know a good resource, and I don't know anywhere that will let me discuss that openly and anonymously besides some random darknet site. i don't think i can see a therapist either, as they can report you if you have intent, and i'm not here to ruin my life, in fact i have no idea how to stop it from being ruined or threatened other than doing this as cleanly as possible.

tldr: I want to kill someone. So please help me understand why I should not, either through media (books, video, podcast), or express why you wouldn't in my situation. I feel pressed and motivated. thank you.
author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

answers.answerContent:
You shouldn't , because there are psychological effects after the crime . You might see the act of killing as Normal and you'll kill another time .

This books might help you :

Meditations by Marcus orelius

Letters from a stoic

Any stoic book will help you to socialize with people and tolerate them . Good luck.
answers.author: tiliton90

comments.comment:
Definitley not going to argue with that logic. I'd like to think this is pretty occasional, this is the first time i've had someone so seriously targeting me, but fact is that is how the mind works, normalization.

I'm ganna look into them right away. Thank you!

I don't know if this is really about socializing and "tolerating", i like to think im very reasonable and tolerant despite the subject at hand. Since day one of moving in with him i said "if you have any problems about me or something im doing, please let me know, because i cant get better if i dont know whats wrong". I feel the issue is more so he's that one in a thousand who's taking things too far when it comes to messing around with my life, and I can't stand the idea of just waiting for this big dude to whack me upside the head when my back is turned. When do I finally stop tolerating? How far is far enough?

Ive already had to move from my house, because he was too dangerous to live with till we got him kicked out, and now I dont feel like i can even go back because he knows the location. God help me if he goes for my family. If they get hurt, i don't know how i'd forgive myself for giving up on my plans now. 

Do I risk baring all that, or risk a felony, and the thought of killing a man directly impacting my life in several negative ways because of reasons because he hates me and doesnt want to make things work out? I lean towards the latter still. I do really hope there's something in these books that might help me settle this for me.
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

comments.comment: You seem like a smart guy , make it look like self defense , and if that's the case , you have to kill him , he's a threat , not just to you , he might hurt someone else in the future . If you need anything let me know in private messages.

comments.comment:
Lol, hey now, you're suppose to change my mind, and that its wrong and that there's another way, not the other way around! 

Joking aside, yes, he ttakes pride in being a menace. If you read what i said to skyfolks, it's pretty extreme. And don't worry, i'll always take advice but I feel good on my method, i'm going to make him disappear nice and clean, and i've got all my motives, alibis, and angles covered. A cop wont even be able to get me once i start moving him.

Ill try to push through these books and let you know what I think. And it means a lot to me to have that option, thank you.
comments.author: anon3r23089

comments.comment:
no i dont know i shouldnt right now, and thats why i want to know why its wrong. 

I dont know what more information i need to give. A man whos integrated in our family, has made clear and direct threats to my face, so close i could feel his spit sprayed on me, that he plans on harming me if he sees me again, and expressed his interest in harming other family members, especially the female ones... If thats not clear intent to harm someone i dont know what is. We live in the same area, his gf is a family member, its a small town, and hes hurt others. and im often out with loved ones he also has extreme aggression for. I dont want to be a victim while just walking down the streets bc some psycho chose me as his Target of the Day.

ive tried talking to him before shit hit the fan. i try to be open about any problems someone has about me, im willing to change. but hes... off. like if you asked me to get you some water and i responded "GET IT YOURSELF, IM NOT YOUR SLAVE, HOW DARE YOU-" that is the energy of the man. And thats something close to how the interaction happened. Not exactly, but the interaction that caused his explosion was VERY casual. And next thing i know hes screaming in my face and threatening me. He also makes direct comparisons to himself and jesus... and says other "cult leader" esk things just to express his mind and who he is a little more. hes not someone you "just talk to" otherwise we wouldnt be here bc ive tried.

how my family reacted is its own issue... they really did not do anything and encouraged me not to either. i called them immiedietley, thinking the same thing as you, i did not know if i should of even called the police that night because i was scared it would not do anything or make it worse, then that would probably trigger his bitch ass. family acted like they have never have had their lives directly threatened before, they said even i should not contact the police or make a big deal over it because the aggressor and his gf were leaving soon for another state, and we all thought they would leave itd blow over. it didnt. they came back, probably kicked out of the new place, and immediately started cussing out and back in town harassing my parents... and now we're just blocking numbers and looking over our shoulders while these people harbor some kind of unbridled rage for us for a LOT of reasons that we have no control over. we would help if we could. we were literally letting them live with me rent free for months before this incident. never had a problem. then one day, boom, cussing me out, threatning me less than an inch from my face in the house i grew up in. i always tried talking to them, i always want to change to be a better person to the people around me, but despite all that communication, he wants to stomp my brains out. ive never been aggressive or even passive aggressive to them, i HAD whatever respect i could lift, but this is messed up.

my friends are stunned by how my family acted. my friends are also on the "do nott kill but don't know what the fuck you do" fence too, so they are a neutral partty in this situation. and i get it. what do you even do here...

that's why i'm seeking something, some kind of real answer. id love this dude to have an epiphony and realize the error of his ways and had a christmas special or something. id get over this in minutes if that happened, i get being as angry at the world as him, but his life is not mine to fix like that. especially when he literally wants to put mine and loved ones in danger. and the way the law system works, my only option is to essentially prepare for an ambush when i'm out and about and probably when i'm offguard. i'm not here to be paranoid everytime i wanna enjoy a night out with a date. i'm not waiting for us to be victims. i cant do that. i'm doing a lot to be prepared for my night, so its quick and clean, i wont be caught, and i make it look like he just walked off one night, like the wonderer he is... he loves taking pride in that... he takes pride in alot of stuff despite doing nothing with his life but yell at his gf and threaten people... he takes pride in all that too, again, hes a REAL asshole and its clear the pride is connected to a lot of it. ive heard him abuse his animals too.

comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

comments.comment:
Actually, i didn't report him. i was just saying i dont know what the police would do even if i did. i was actually encouraged not to report anything because of my family. I touched a bit on that with skyfolks answers. There's no official records we have had any contact. And the way my town is, and the way he is, if I made him "just disappear" it'd be a lot more suspected he just walked out or something. He has no one besides his gf hes connected to and they fight every single night dude. He's ruined all of his connections, i'm actually a pretty surprising suspect when you look at the line up. Plus, definitley no official police record with him. I got a lot planned out, and as long as i play my angles, im not going to get caught. And i dont know where i said i told my family about kiling him, but just 2 friends, and they arent going to be questioned because im not leaving the scene to look like he was even murdered. Just left. People leave randomly all the time, go missing, and he likes traveling. He's not someone they will look into, especially like this. The police are ganna ask his gf when their last fight was, shes ganna say the previous day then theyll give her the "Well, we'll look into him" with no real leads. Especially me. So pressure is just on me to make sure i really cover my trail, and not get caught.

Is not thinking about it really an option? Isn't that what most of the world does with everything, and everything just gets worse? From the homeless problems to pollution, and several other problems literally destroying our planet?. I really believe this dude is a threat and a problem for us, and not thinking about it has not made him go away yet. 

I've had a lot of positive thoughts when they moved several states away. I have evidence he did. But then they came back to my specific town, a few miles down the road. What if he does hurt me or my family? I really don't know what positive thoughts i'll be able to think then. What if he kills me? I don't think anything will matter after that... These are thoughts that I don't feel logically make sense to ignore, when he has hurt people before, he's an agressive and explosive person with a possibly very warped sense of reality, and has definite intent on hurting me. Why do you think nothing bad will come from ignoring this?
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

answers.answerContent: your life will be ruined anyways if you kill this person.

comments.comment: Gone as far as I can on that. However he's nearly ttwice my size, and im not confident in anything if he catches me offguard like im ganna catch him, and i dont want to be paranoid everytime i go outside. Feels like it is as equal or even more of a risk than just watching him, waiting, and trying to take him out if i find an oppertunity to get him.
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

comments.comment:
Definitley not going to argue with that logic. I'd like to think this is pretty occasional, this is the first time i've had someone so seriously targeting me, but fact is that is how the mind works, normalization.

I'm ganna look into them right away. Thank you!

I don't know if this is really about socializing and "tolerating", i like to think im very reasonable and tolerant despite the subject at hand. Since day one of moving in with him i said "if you have any problems about me or something im doing, please let me know, because i cant get better if i dont know whats wrong". I feel the issue is more so he's that one in a thousand who's taking things too far when it comes to messing around with my life, and I can't stand the idea of just waiting for this big dude to whack me upside the head when my back is turned. When do I finally stop tolerating? How far is far enough?

Ive already had to move from my house, because he was too dangerous to live with till we got him kicked out, and now I dont feel like i can even go back because he knows the location. God help me if he goes for my family. If they get hurt, i don't know how i'd forgive myself for giving up on my plans now. 

Do I risk baring all that, or risk a felony, and the thought of killing a man directly impacting my life in several negative ways because of reasons because he hates me and doesnt want to make things work out? I lean towards the latter still. I do really hope there's something in these books that might help me settle this for me.
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

comments.comment: You seem like a smart guy , make it look like self defense , and if that's the case , you have to kill him , he's a threat , not just to you , he might hurt someone else in the future . If you need anything let me know in private messages.
comments.author: tiliton90

comments.comment:
Lol, hey now, you're suppose to change my mind, and that its wrong and that there's another way, not the other way around! 

Joking aside, yes, he ttakes pride in being a menace. If you read what i said to skyfolks, it's pretty extreme. And don't worry, i'll always take advice but I feel good on my method, i'm going to make him disappear nice and clean, and i've got all my motives, alibis, and angles covered. A cop wont even be able to get me once i start moving him.

Ill try to push through these books and let you know what I think. And it means a lot to me to have that option, thank you.
comments.author: anon3r23089

comments.comment:
no i dont know i shouldnt right now, and thats why i want to know why its wrong. 

I dont know what more information i need to give. A man whos integrated in our family, has made clear and direct threats to my face, so close i could feel his spit sprayed on me, that he plans on harming me if he sees me again, and expressed his interest in harming other family members, especially the female ones... If thats not clear intent to harm someone i dont know what is. We live in the same area, his gf is a family member, its a small town, and hes hurt others. and im often out with loved ones he also has extreme aggression for. I dont want to be a victim while just walking down the streets bc some psycho chose me as his Target of the Day.

ive tried talking to him before shit hit the fan. i try to be open about any problems someone has about me, im willing to change. but hes... off. like if you asked me to get you some water and i responded "GET IT YOURSELF, IM NOT YOUR SLAVE, HOW DARE YOU-" that is the energy of the man. And thats something close to how the interaction happened. Not exactly, but the interaction that caused his explosion was VERY casual. And next thing i know hes screaming in my face and threatening me. He also makes direct comparisons to himself and jesus... and says other "cult leader" esk things just to express his mind and who he is a little more. hes not someone you "just talk to" otherwise we wouldnt be here bc ive tried.

I dont know what police are supposed to do. Theres not enough evidence to prove anything, if he got locked up, hed probably out in a few months or year if im lucky, and then what? just hope he forgot? If you had a Uncle or some close but distant family member, they threatened the safety of you and your family, and know where you and your family live, and is explosive enough to randomly attack you on site if you saw eachother in public, and we have before the fight, we shop in common areas, what would you do?

Please let me know if theres some specific piece of information, that you need, and i did not convey. But I think I need to be a bit vague, not trying to leave anything too identifiable here, including a motive.
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

comments.comment: I got it clearly now. It's such a complicated situation bro. I really don't know what I would do if I were in your place. But I still think there must be another way to solve this. Did you try to talk with your family about it? They can help you.
comments.author: SkyfolksV.2

comments.comment:
how my family reacted is its own issue... they really did not do anything and encouraged me not to either. i called them immiedietley, thinking the same thing as you, i did not know if i should of even called the police that night because i was scared it would not do anything or make it worse, then that would probably trigger his bitch ass. family acted like they have never have had their lives directly threatened before, they said even i should not contact the police or make a big deal over it because the aggressor and his gf were leaving soon for another state, and we all thought they would leave itd blow over. it didnt. they came back, probably kicked out of the new place, and immediately started cussing out and back in town harassing my parents... and now we're just blocking numbers and looking over our shoulders while these people harbor some kind of unbridled rage for us for a LOT of reasons that we have no control over. we would help if we could. we were literally letting them live with me rent free for months before this incident. never had a problem. then one day, boom, cussing me out, threatning me less than an inch from my face in the house i grew up in. i always tried talking to them, i always want to change to be a better person to the people around me, but despite all that communication, he wants to stomp my brains out. ive never been aggressive or even passive aggressive to them, i HAD whatever respect i could lift, but this is messed up.

my friends are stunned by how my family acted. my friends are also on the "do nott kill but don't know what the fuck you do" fence too, so they are a neutral partty in this situation. and i get it. what do you even do here...

that's why i'm seeking something, some kind of real answer. id love this dude to have an epiphony and realize the error of his ways and had a christmas special or something. id get over this in minutes if that happened, i get being as angry at the world as him, but his life is not mine to fix like that. especially when he literally wants to put mine and loved ones in danger. and the way the law system works, my only option is to essentially prepare for an ambush when i'm out and about and probably when i'm offguard. i'm not here to be paranoid everytime i wanna enjoy a night out with a date. i'm not waiting for us to be victims. i cant do that. i'm doing a lot to be prepared for my night, so its quick and clean, i wont be caught, and i make it look like he just walked off one night, like the wonderer he is... he loves taking pride in that... he takes pride in alot of stuff despite doing nothing with his life but yell at his gf and threaten people... he takes pride in all that too, again, hes a REAL asshole and its clear the pride is connected to a lot of it. ive heard him abuse his animals too.

So please, im mostly resolved in my path and confident in my plan, but if theres a real alternative option im not seeing or understanding, i want to. i got killing, i got waiting to possibly be killed. i just want maybe one or two others. Thank you for taking the time to listen to me by the way.
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

comments.comment:
how my family reacted is its own issue... they really did not do anything and encouraged me not to either. i called them immiedietley, thinking the same thing as you, i did not know if i should of even called the police that night because i was scared it would not do anything or make it worse, then that would probably trigger his bitch ass. family acted like they have never have had their lives directly threatened before, they said even i should not contact the police or make a big deal over it because the aggressor and his gf were leaving soon for another state, and we all thought they would leave itd blow over. it didnt. they came back, probably kicked out of the new place, and immediately started cussing out and back in town harassing my parents... and now we're just blocking numbers and looking over our shoulders while these people harbor some kind of unbridled rage for us for a LOT of reasons that we have no control over. we would help if we could. we were literally letting them live with me rent free for months before this incident. never had a problem. then one day, boom, cussing me out, threatning me less than an inch from my face in the house i grew up in. i always tried talking to them, i always want to change to be a better person to the people around me, but despite all that communication, he wants to stomp my brains out. ive never been aggressive or even passive aggressive to them, i HAD whatever respect i could lift, but this is messed up.

my friends are stunned by how my family acted. my friends are also on the "do nott kill but don't know what the fuck you do" fence too, so they are a neutral partty in this situation. and i get it. what do you even do here...

that's why i'm seeking something, some kind of real answer. id love this dude to have an epiphony and realize the error of his ways and had a christmas special or something. id get over this in minutes if that happened, i get being as angry at the world as him, but his life is not mine to fix like that. especially when he literally wants to put mine and loved ones in danger. and the way the law system works, my only option is to essentially prepare for an ambush when i'm out and about and probably when i'm offguard. i'm not here to be paranoid everytime i wanna enjoy a night out with a date. i'm not waiting for us to be victims. i cant do that. i'm doing a lot to be prepared for my night, so its quick and clean, i wont be caught, and i make it look like he just walked off one night, like the wonderer he is... he loves taking pride in that... he takes pride in alot of stuff despite doing nothing with his life but yell at his gf and threaten people... he takes pride in all that too, again, hes a REAL asshole and its clear the pride is connected to a lot of it. ive heard him abuse his animals too.

So please, im mostly resolved in my path and confident in my plan, but if theres a real alternative option im not seeing or understanding, i want to. i got killing, i got waiting to possibly be killed. i just want maybe one or two others. Thank you for taking the time to listen to me by the way.
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

comments.comment: Get rid of him otherwise. Do anything but kill him because if you kill him you are the one with problems. Do anything but kill him. For example threar him with a knife or torture him or so but if you kill him he is in peace and your life is ruined is that really what you want?

He threatened me in my own house, and that made me feel certain things. I'm pretty rational despite the topic of this post. But with that said, if him threatening me lead to me doing this, what do you think a bat shit insane mofo is going to do if you threaten him? He's not going to justt walk away, stay away and cowar. Maybe he would, but if thats the way it works, then why am I waiting outside of his frequent shops after his threats?

Reality is where youre at. I want to live here. I have things to live for. He wants to damage that. He has had my worst interests in mind, and seeks to harm me. I would be incredibly happy if he just found peace, lived his dreams, and never harmed anyone ever again... As long as i know he will stop fucking with me. 

So short answer to your question, yes. I don't know why everyone has the assumption I will be caught. You guys know how many people go missing a day right? Police don't even look for you after like three days... But besides that, if my only other consequence is the guilt from killing him.... Well I guess I'll just have to take in strides, day by day... anyways, back to stalking!

Gone as far as I can on that. However he's nearly ttwice my size, and im not confident in anything if he catches me offguard like im ganna catch him, and i dont want to be paranoid everytime i go outside. Feels like it is as equal or even more of a risk than just watching him, waiting, and trying to take him out if i find an oppertunity to get him.
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

comments.comment:
Actually, i didn't report him. i was just saying i dont know what the police would do even if i did. i was actually encouraged not to report anything because of my family. I touched a bit on that with skyfolks answers. There's no official records we have had any contact. And the way my town is, and the way he is, if I made him "just disappear" it'd be a lot more suspected he just walked out or something. He has no one besides his gf hes connected to and they fight every single night dude. He's ruined all of his connections, i'm actually a pretty surprising suspect when you look at the line up. Plus, definitley no official police record with him. I got a lot planned out, and as long as i play my angles, im not going to get caught. And i dont know where i said i told my family about kiling him, but just 2 friends, and they arent going to be questioned because im not leaving the scene to look like he was even murdered. Just left. People leave randomly all the time, go missing, and he likes traveling. He's not someone they will look into, especially like this. The police are ganna ask his gf when their last fight was, shes ganna say the previous day then theyll give her the "Well, we'll look into him" with no real leads. Especially me. So pressure is just on me to make sure i really cover my trail, and not get caught.

Is not thinking about it really an option? Isn't that what most of the world does with everything, and everything just gets worse? From the homeless problems to pollution, and several other problems literally destroying our planet?. I really believe this dude is a threat and a problem for us, and not thinking about it has not made him go away yet. 

I've had a lot of positive thoughts when they moved several states away. I have evidence he did. But then they came back to my specific town, a few miles down the road. What if he does hurt me or my family? I really don't know what positive thoughts i'll be able to think then. What if he kills me? I don't think anything will matter after that... These are thoughts that I don't feel logically make sense to ignore, when he has hurt people before, he's an agressive and explosive person with a possibly very warped sense of reality, and has definite intent on hurting me. Why do you think nothing bad will come from ignoring this?
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

answers.answerContent:
Don't 
u said u talked with the police about it and u are in a small town     
the chances of getting caught is high, also u talked with ur family about it, interrogation makes people weak no matter who are they.

with that said, a way to get away from that man  is to change ur believes about it;
for 7 days imagine a better situation for ur family and ur self 
every seconds of this 7 days, the better situation can be like a GIF that every seconds reminds u of ur better situation and don't think a situation for him 

let me know if u had any question about it
answers.author: aria6054

comments.comment: Get rid of him otherwise. Do anything but kill him because if you kill him you are the one with problems. Do anything but kill him. For example threar him with a knife or torture him or so but if you kill him he is in peace and your life is ruined is that really what you want?

Definitley not going to argue with that logic. I'd like to think this is pretty occasional, this is the first time i've had someone so seriously targeting me, but fact is that is how the mind works, normalization.

I'm ganna look into them right away. Thank you!

I don't know if this is really about socializing and "tolerating", i like to think im very reasonable and tolerant despite the subject at hand. Since day one of moving in with him i said "if you have any problems about me or something im doing, please let me know, because i cant get better if i dont know whats wrong". I feel the issue is more so he's that one in a thousand who's taking things too far when it comes to messing around with my life, and I can't stand the idea of just waiting for this big dude to whack me upside the head when my back is turned. When do I finally stop tolerating? How far is far enough?

Ive already had to move from my house, because he was too dangerous to live with till we got him kicked out, and now I dont feel like i can even go back because he knows the location. God help me if he goes for my family. If they get hurt, i don't know how i'd forgive myself for giving up on my plans now. 

Do I risk baring all that, or risk a felony, and the thought of killing a man directly impacting my life in several negative ways because of reasons because he hates me and doesnt want to make things work out? I lean towards the latter still. I do really hope there's something in these books that might help me settle this for me.
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

comments.comment: You seem like a smart guy , make it look like self defense , and if that's the case , you have to kill him , he's a threat , not just to you , he might hurt someone else in the future . If you need anything let me know in private messages.
comments.author: tiliton90

comments.comment:
Lol, hey now, you're suppose to change my mind, and that its wrong and that there's another way, not the other way around! 

Joking aside, yes, he ttakes pride in being a menace. If you read what i said to skyfolks, it's pretty extreme. And don't worry, i'll always take advice but I feel good on my method, i'm going to make him disappear nice and clean, and i've got all my motives, alibis, and angles covered. A cop wont even be able to get me once i start moving him.

Ill try to push through these books and let you know what I think. And it means a lot to me to have that option, thank you.
comments.author: anon3r23089

comments.comment:
no i dont know i shouldnt right now, and thats why i want to know why its wrong. 

I dont know what more information i need to give. A man whos integrated in our family, has made clear and direct threats to my face, so close i could feel his spit sprayed on me, that he plans on harming me if he sees me again, and expressed his interest in harming other family members, especially the female ones... If thats not clear intent to harm someone i dont know what is. We live in the same area, his gf is a family member, its a small town, and hes hurt others. and im often out with loved ones he also has extreme aggression for. I dont want to be a victim while just walking down the streets bc some psycho chose me as his Target of the Day.

ive tried talking to him before shit hit the fan. i try to be open about any problems someone has about me, im willing to change. but hes... off. like if you asked me to get you some water and i responded "GET IT YOURSELF, IM NOT YOUR SLAVE, HOW DARE YOU-" that is the energy of the man. And thats something close to how the interaction happened. Not exactly, but the interaction that caused his explosion was VERY casual. And next thing i know hes screaming in my face and threatening me. He also makes direct comparisons to himself and jesus... and says other "cult leader" esk things just to express his mind and who he is a little more. hes not someone you "just talk to" otherwise we wouldnt be here bc ive tried.

I dont know what police are supposed to do. Theres not enough evidence to prove anything, if he got locked up, hed probably out in a few months or year if im lucky, and then what? just hope he forgot? If you had a Uncle or some close but distant family member, they threatened the safety of you and your family, and know where you and your family live, and is explosive enough to randomly attack you on site if you saw eachother in public, and we have before the fight, we shop in common areas, what would you do?

Please let me know if theres some specific piece of information, that you need, and i did not convey. But I think I need to be a bit vague, not trying to leave anything too identifiable here, including a motive.
comments.author: anon3r23089anon3r23089

comments.comment: I got it clearly now. It's such a complicated situation bro. I really don't know what I would do if I were in your place. But I still think there must be another way to solve this. Did you try to talk with your family about it? They can help you.

answers.answerContent: The truth is that a stunning number of murders go unsolved, but this is not the right answer. Depending on your situation, you can and should seek protection with the justice system if this person threatens you again. It sounds like this person is dependent on scaring you when others are not around, so it's your word against theirs. So try learning basic hacking first before trying to hack social medias. If you do so, you will be able to think for yourself how to hack them

title: Car crash
question: So I had a bad car accident due to drunk driving on my end, I only occasionally drink and honestly don’t remember drinking that much that night but I don’t remember much of what happened at all not sure if it was due to the wreck or alcohol. The property damage is estimated at 160,000.00 my insurance liability covers up 100,000 so am I going to have to pay out of pocket the other 60,000? At this point I’m ready to just kill myself as I’m having a hard time processing this since I don’t ever drink like this, I don’t want to seem bitter but I have friends who drive drunk 3-5 times a week from the bar for years and nothing bad happens to them. It really depends on your jurisdiction and if you caused all this damage to a single entity/person.

You said that the damages were estimated 160k, eventually you can convince/prove them that 100k is enough.

Or at least low ball that value. If you don't have the money, very likely they will need to sue (or prosecute) you to have it. And the judge will very likely propose a way for you to pay that amount, even if take a lot of time in monthly payments that will will fit in your earnings.

But again, it depends on the jurisdiction. Maybe is good to talk to an attorney to make sure of what will happen.

But no reason to kill yourself.

Don't blow your brains out over this. This stuff happens all the time, with multi car rear ends and a lot of accidents involving Teslas. Get your shit together, and learn from this. Dick Cheney was a college drop out power line worker, he had multiple DUIs, and he got an education from a community college when he was like 24 and he managed to become the vice president.

$60,000 is not a ton of money, especially not worth your life and one DUI isn't the end of the world. Make better decisions, stop drinking, develop a skill, start weightlifting, and man up. This will all be a drop in the bucket eventually.

due to my work I had to venture into money laundering and the simplest way is through a company (preferably an LLC with a current account apart from the personal one). Then make the incoming dirty money fit with the company's balance sheets but always gradually. Example if I have a Thai food delivery place with a clean monthly income of 5K and I have undeclared / murky income I will add them as sales safely without raising suspicions.
 For success of this, order and not rushing is key. it will always be easier to launder physical assets than digital ones, but the NFT industry also allows efficient laundering if all situations are met.

This is explained in a very summarized way, to put it into practice is a little more complex since it requires logistics and having liquidity from before. The Treasury knows these techniques but if it does not raise any suspicion and complies with the payment of taxes nothing should happen.

title: how to create a p2p server/coding area?
question:
I am thinking of making an area where a server can be shared. So kind of like the coding environment and terminal of another computer, but being able to access it remotely.

A remote computer can be accessed with ssh from the host computer, but that involves going physically to the other computer and configuring everything .

My idea is this: a web service with p2p that allows a user to access another computer and storing files without actually downloading things. Bitorrent relies on downloading, which would be a problem since my computer can't handle storage.

The other part of my idea is a p2p server that allows people to store files and code on it without putting pressure on their own device.

I'm not really sure how to explain this good. Maybe some info that can help me understand this better.
author: poop

answers.answerContent:
There is definitely a platform that could do this, I've done exactly this with Proxmox. Proxmox is a virtualization platform designed to be administered entirely through a web browser without downloading any extra software. While SPICE could make your remote desktop connection a little faster, the NoVNC works just fine in the browser.

(I don't have the code anymore, just poking your brain so you can get an idea of how this could work) A couple years ago, I used to work at a Iowa State University helping fellow Software Engineering students. I had my Proxmox server back at my dorm. For some students in my class, they didn't have laptops powerful enough to run some of the IDEs we liked, so they remoted into the university servers. To make things a little easier on them, I wrote my own solution in PHP (I know, shut up, I wasn't good at JS back then): a wrapper script for the Proxmox API. Upon visiting the page, it would trigger a call to Proxmox which cloned a KVM from Debian template, pulled the necessary info, then redirected the student to the NoVNC session. Upon closing the NoVNC console, a cron job running every few minutes would kill/deallocate the VM. So whenever students wanted to do something real quick, from any device, they could pull up a fully functioning, software-loaded, and clean development environment, do whatever they wanted for however long they wanted, then left.

If you don't want to script this, the Proxmox web interface is still pretty intuitive and supports a full user permission system. You can do it all by hand pretty easily. Plus it's free and whatnot, so that's cool. Just gotta get the server set up on hardware that can run however many VMs you plan on running
I really don't know

author: samualvalhalla

answers.answerContent: Anonymous? Not so sure. There's not going to be any reputable cloud provider that will do this. You're going to be much better off buying your own hardware and leeching nearby wifi for internet (no good ISP will give you business anonymously either). Depending on what you want the server space for, something as easy as a raspberry pi could do.

comments.comment:
It's impossible to be truly anonymous. your IRL info always gets leaked somewhere. even if you use TOR with a VPN chances are you end up leaking your info signing up with the VPN. Also, you can't intrinsically trust VPN providers that say their don't log traffic just because they say so.

I rate a better option is to roll your own VPN with cloud and OpenVPN, connect to TOR, do whatever (be it crashing the world economy, or just accessing your mail privately from a restricted country, the motive doesn't matter), delete the instance, and move on. 

The point is being able to use an 'anonymous' cloud IP as an extra layer between you and whoever is listening.

make sense?

title: Can the police search a minor if they suspect drugs?
question: If someone is a 15 years old female, and the police arrests her suspecting distribution of illegal substance, can they search her, and to what degree?

answers.answerContent:
It depends of where this "someone person with 15 yo" live. If she live in US, for an example, the police response will depends of the state constitution. If she live in some country in South America, which is based of underdeveloped countries, she probably will be searched without any warn. In rich countries/states the chance to get arrested for it is low.

For all cases: depends.
answers.author: Euthanasia

answers.answerContent: 2pac gave the best answer.
answers.author: SkyfolksV.2

answers.answerContent:
I agree with another answer that it depends on where that someone is.

In Russia many teenagers/minors are involved in dark web drug trade as its quick easy money. Police and authorities absolutely do not tolerate it. I know of two minors, one male one female who got caught, both of them got 'conditional conviction' (a thing in Russia similar to parole where you make one more misstep and you go to prison).

To answer your question, on their own accounts both of them were searched upon arrest by officers of the same sex in presence of two witnesses of the same sex. They were requested to surrender all belongings, undress completely, remove all underwear, everything. Their bodies and body cavities were examined, all their clothes and belongings were examined and swab tested. The girl was 14.

I've heard that in Western and Central Europe the police is very liberal to these kinds of occurences and it is unlikely there will be arrest or search of this kind. Can't say about the rest of the world.

2pac said all: it depends.

It reminds me something I read on the news a while ago about a poor chap who got 3 cavity searches before a exploratory surgery because a K9 with a strong record of false positives pointed to him after being pulled over.

It was a false positive.

If a jurisdiction law allow that kind of thing, searching a minor should not be a huge concern for them.
answers.author: poorpta

answers.answerContent:
Generic medical records? Why in hell would any one buy that????

I would see a reason for  trying to get specific ones, but that will be really hard.

Pro tip: that are some hacking groups that publishes data dumps if their victims don't pay the ransom. Some of them target private hospitals.

You may find some there, for free. 

Otherwise, better know an IT guy from the hospital that you want records from. If you have deep pockets, go to LinkedIn, and ask if they are willing to sell you.

It won't take long for you to find someone willing to do, but I suspect that won't come cheap.

title: Old Hidden Answers database dump (partial)
question:
So I'm new here, but I understand there was some drama with the old Hidden Answers shutting down and conflict among the admins/mods etc etc. I have no interest in that drama, but I do have something cool to share.

Last year I was working on a project. I won't get into the details, and the project is archived now, but the cool part of this project involved indexing large chunks of the Tor network. Given that Hidden Answers is offline now, I pulled the my project archive back online and took a look around the old database, only to find that a good chunk of the Hidden Answers database was archived and nested within my own database. I wrote a small script to compile all the old URLs from the site, which includes the titles of about 27 thousand questions and some profiles.

It was fun to browse around the old database and see the questions people were asking. Perhaps it could be a project in the future for me to compile the old database into a functioning mirror site?

Unfortunately HA doesn't allow me to attach files directly, so I've uploaded it to Backblaze for you to download. I likely won't host this file there indefinitely, especially if it starts getting abused: https://f000.backblazeb2.com/file/filesharedrop/hiddenAnswers-2020-urls-slimmed.txt
author: FlamingOctopusFlamingOctopus

answers.answerContent:
Really strange project, but I can see some reasonableness in it.

At first, I thought that you had the proper DB with all the information, like The posts contents.

Nice anyway.

Would have the other versions? I mean, ES, PT and RU?
answers.author: poorpta

comments.comment:
I do have page content for most of these saved, but that'd be significantly larger to attach. It's saved as raw HTML in an Elasticsearch index, so while possible, it'd be a pain in the butt to extract and get to a viewable state.

Honestly I didn't look. I compiled this file by pulling everything from the database listed under the old URL, I forgot that the site had multiple versions so I didn't look for any other URL. It's possible there's some in there, but I don't remember seeing much.
comments.author: FlamingOctopus

comments.comment: Look up "web spiders" or "web crawling"

title: ¿Whats your opinion on the Russian-Ucranian conflict?
question: We all know the war that's happening now on Ucrania and Russia, but ¿what do you think about it? ¿Whats gonna happen? ¿Are the governments doing what they should do? ¿How do you feel about all this?
author: Apple

answers.answerContent:
It's a little frightening. I wish the US would step in a little heavier, aside from Biden's haphazard "Hey Russia you stop that" statements so far. I'm an active member of the US military, we've been over there monitoring the situation as it developed, and we're over there now. I'll wager, or at least I'll hope that we're going to get more involved.

Ukraine isn't in NATO, but it's the only thing sitting between Russia and a massive body of NATO countries. It serves as a strategic advantage for Russia to take Ukraine, but naturally it makes a lot of those NATO countries very nervous. The US has a legally binding responsibility to defend those countries, so we'd definitely be beefing up defenses around that area, even if we don't get involved directly.

Overall I'm excited. I'm just as much against the military industrial complex as the next guy here in the states, but good god we need something to rally against. A strong and clear foreign conflict could be good for us. Obviously that's very self-centered, but I'm hoping that we can kick the shit out of some Russians while simultaneously boosting the overall moral of the US and by extension the world.
answers.author: FlamingOctopus

title: does anyone know good and reliable news sites?
question: I'm trying to find if any such thing exists but I imagine there has to be something out there on the darknet that actually does reporting right?
author: onionflavoredbagel

answers.answerContent: I would absolutely not come to Tor in search of reliable news media. There is no single media organization you can look to for truth. Go read 10 different news outlets and make your own opinion about current events. Tor isn't some magical place where truth can be found on any street corner, it's literally just a anonymization network riddled with nerds, privacy advocates, and kids looking for tips on how to hack instagram. Grow up
answers.author: FlamingOctopusonionflavoredbagel

comments.comment: sorry didn't mean to come off like that if I did, I was just curious. thanks though
comments.author: onionflavoredbagel

comments.comment: Ah sorry, I was very drunk writing this out, apologies for being a dick. Good luck man. I think there is such a thing as objective truth, but you can go pretty damn crazy trying to figure out what that even means.
comments.author: FlamingOctopus

answers.answerContent:
Stop looking for truth. There is no such thing. Instead, look for multiple verifiably independent sources. Compare notes between sources. Determine breadcrumbs of truth from there and make your decision based on that.
The problem with any news source is that they can corroborate between other members of the industry, and one bad apple in that industry can poison everyone else by using their built up trust to convince everyone else they're telling the truth.
Always assume media is propaganda.

title: Fake payout in to Bank
question:
Hi ,

I am developing a software for my client  in which my client enter any legitimate Bank account with Amount he would like to transfer once he click on transfer then a unconfirmed transaction goes to that particular bank account. I have searched alot in  Dark web is there any tool using that i can do also search alot about payment gateway on darkweb who helped me for this.

So kindly suggest me is there any financial  company, Payment provider on dark web with their Api so that i can able to achieve this goal successfully.

I Request to all people in community to help me by giving the needful information.

Thanks & Regards
author: kundra1985

answers.answerContent:
I didn't understand exactly what you want to do.

Do you want to simulate a wire transfer from an internet banking from a legitimate bank? Or program something outside the bank that would give a fake value to a legitimate bank account?

Because it depends a lot on country's banking systems. On most developed economies, it should not be possible do that because of the underlying technology used on transfers. Maybe you can trick one of those payment processors (e.g. Paypal), but even so, is not that simple.

The dark web is an enabler for the circulation of illegal weapons already on the black market, as well as a potential source of diversion of legally owned weapons.

While the arms trade is small in volume compared to other products trafficked online, its potential impact on international security is significant.

The proliferation and international illicit movement of firearms and explosives around the world involves a complex mix of interrelated issues.

Despite efforts to regulate firearms, there are several avenues for corporate criminals to circumvent controls and traffic weapons across international borders. This issue has emerged as particularly relevant to EU security despite stringent firearms control measures.

One possible path is through the 'dark web', which hosts many different online black markets that facilitate the sale of prohibited firearms, weapons, explosives and digital materials.

title: Any paranormal or spiritual experience you wanna share?
question: Do you believe in paranormal stuff or any religion? Have you ever had a experience related to it?
author: Apple

answers.answerContent:
I have had some paranormal experience, but I had nothing to do with any religion;
The first one was simple, I was in my room because of the tor surfing and I got thirsty and drank my bottle of water leaving it empty, I got up and went to the bathroom to pee, when I came back with the intention of refilling the bottle, it was full again, I know which may be silly, but I didn't refill that bottle and no one was in the house except me.

The second was a little more rare, although that was more subjective, I was in the living room of my house with my family, and my brother was on the sofa next to me, but it was a moment while I was watching television where, for my most peripheral part, From my visual field I detected a silhouette or shadow moving, I looked and saw it for a few seconds, those seconds were long for me, although there was the typical noise of a house because there were people, everything was silent, and I saw those seconds as if slow motion, I don't know what it was but something else was with me in the room and it wasn't my brother, I kept looking and he went towards the corridor, as I say it was a few seconds but for me it was very slow and I saw many details, it was a silhouette with the appearance of a human but only a little, it was something very strange and its edges were not smooth they were like spikes, I know that the writing is not very good and that I repeat many things but it is what I remember and I know that it was not any reflection or anything, also a few minutes after this, my brother stayed m Going to the same place as me, I asked him what he was looking at but he said nothing, I never spoke about it again but I'm sure he saw something strange, I can also promise you that he was not under the influence of any drug

I know that my experiences may seem silly, very simple things but I know that they were not normal, I know that it is a bit long to read and that I repeat information but every time I try to explain it it is difficult for me to order the details without having to repeat things since in the second it is like many feelings that I had you know something strange that you notice.
answers.author: figueras7Apple

title: Can someone help me with my life?
question:
I have no Idea where to start, December 1-2020, My girlfriend left me for a guy and didn't even bothered to tell the reason behind it. Still I don't know. I changed my career and left my passion and hobbies just to take care of her and almost spent around 600 dollars per month just for the sake of her daily needs. Later I heard from one of my friends that she's been sleeping with a lot of dudes from her college when we were in a relationship. The day she left me is the same day I lost my dad. I couldn't even bring myself all together, Yet still I somehow managed to accept all of this and tried to bring back my life together. I started hitting the gym, had a healthy lifestyle and a clean work routine.

Last month she texted me and asked me to take her back as her new boyfriend left her. Ever since she texted, I'm no longer focused of my goals and I'm always waiting for her text. I tried apply for 3 grad schools and got rejected from all of em and I also got fired from my job last week, even though it was my seniors mistake. I'm severely addicted to porn and I can't stop doing it. I try to work hard and keep myself positive all the time, Still I haven't been able to cross this rough path. I don't have any friends or family to advice me through this. I don't know what to do. I'm tired. I wanna go somewhere and never return. I just wanna be happy.. is there any ways I can regain my happiness?

Thanks for your time :)

answers.answerContent:
I would have to say she is not good for you and you should not focus on her. You need a reset, just let yourself have some fun. If you enjoy the gym, focus on that and try to get back into  the hobbies you left. Look for something that you always wanted to try. Of course the lost job is an issue, can you go back to your original career?

I was married to a woman that was all about herself and didn't ever care about anyone else's interest. She sucked the life out of me but i was too focused on her to see it at the time. When she decided to leave  my whole life seemed to just stop. I ended up in a hospital for 7 days for "Stress". They did help me understand that you can't be so focused on someone else and not take care of yourself. You are no good to anyone else if you are messed up. The gym and healthy lifestyle are a great start.

Of course i'm just a random person on the network and have no clue about you other than what you posted. Find a way to have some fun.
answers.author: imhim

answers.answerContent: just concentrate on the positive things you have accomplished after your girlfriend and try to go out for walks and hikes. about the porn thing try to consume it in a reading material. just keep positive.

Let her go. Block her number and avoid her contact at all costs.

There are plenty of fish in the sea. Just organize and put yourself in a good mental state before go fishing again.
answers.author: poorpta

answers.answerContent:
Dude, you deserve way better than her. It sounds like your affection and love for her is not matched by her at all. It's going to be hard, but you need to move on to someone that will give you the love and respect you deserve.

I've also been in some dark places and know how hard it can be. Just focus on one small thing you can do today, and do it. It may be calling one place looking for an interview, work out for an hour, stop yourself from watching porn, or just getting out of bed even if you really don't want to. You might not do those things the next day or even mess up later that same day, but that's ok. It doesn't matter if you aren't perfect or super productive all day; just get that one thing done and freakin celebrate. Focus on the good you are doing to work towards a better self. Just getting on here and being so open about this shows your devotion to bettering yourself and shows you are really trying.

I believe in you man. You got this.
answers.author: justAnother_human

answers.answerContent: Hey friend, don't feel sad of what happened to you in past. Because your bad past will never trouble you again, it's gone. So don't spoil your present worrying about it. Don't even worry of what will happen to you tomorrow or in future. The best way to feel happy is to accept what comes to you in life, it may be good or bad, but your attitude of accepting it, must be positive. Take the name of Krishna or Jesus or Allah or any other form of God you follow. Be happy my friend, because the bad past will never return, the bad present will certainly end in future, and the bad future cannot last longer than death. So keep smiling my friend.

title: How get a gun from tor guns
question:
I wanna get a gun from the darkwab(tor guns) I want to learn step by step. How do you pay & what I must to protection my self... . . 
Please??

answers.answerContent:
First you must buy cryptocurrency (Bitcoin or another crypto they accept). If you concern about your privacy, then choose a P2P exchange (like Bisq) or find Bitcoin ATM near you.

If they accept XMR (monero), then it's even safer due to anonymous nature of this coin.

You won't buy XMR anywhere. You buy bitcoins and then convert BTC to XMR somewhere (there are many anonymous exchanges like Godex, SimpleSwap, etc)

For storing monero I recommend the official wallet: Monero GUI

Also many mobile wallets (Coinomi, Exodus) support both cryptocurrencies and allow to exchange them anonymously in third-party services.

When you have bitcoins, monero or other crypto supported by market, then make an order and make payment.

One note about shipping. If you don't have any drop place (e.g. abandoned building), then the safest option is to order to your house. It won't make suspiction at shipping company. Otherwise they may open and check contents of the package.

Learn also about controlled delivery. If asked to sign, it's safer to refuse so and deny that you ordered something from the sender.

title: How to relocate?
question: I'd like to know how to get out of a country in order to immigrate to another, like from what should I start?
author: kawk

answers.answerContent:
It depends on several factors.

First of all, where in your life are you currently? College, graduated, working but no degree, single, married, with kids, good job, no job, savings to spend, living from paycheck to paycheck, so on.

Because that will lead your choices. It is far easier to relocate alone willing to accept any job and being an illegal immigrant for a while than run the whole legal and bureaucratic road to get a working permit or visa for you and a wife.

After that, how much that will cost? Do you have the means? Do you need financing?

Then, do you have any blocks? Legal problems on your home country? Language barrier?

How open to immigrants is the country you want to go to? How easy is to become part of the community? How to be accepted there?

This is the first assessment you need to do. You can find several resources online. Numbeo is the go to website to compare cost of living. There will be, in most cases, some kind of blog from people that migrated there, look for them. Also, for pricing purposes, try to find online classified and grocery sites for that country. It always provide a good idea on property, furniture, rent and food value.

And the most important: plan a lot. Try to imagine the kind of problem that you may have and how you need to solve that problem. Consider absurd scenarios like war, pandemics, revolutions, riots, death (no matter if yours, significant other, kids, someone back home), accidents and what else comes to your mind.

Planning ahead will give you time and knowledge beforehand to react properly.

Also, consider that, eventually, it is better to stay where you are. No matter your situation, it will always be easier to solve your problems at your home country than trying to solve something being foreigner.
answers.author: poorpta

title: Why boner
question:
So early 20s, first girlfriend, both agree on no sexual things before marriage, but I get boners when she leans her head on mine, holds my hand, calls me cute, etc. I don't have sexual thoughts or desires about her but it still happens. It also doesn't feel like a normal boner, it feels more happy (if that makes any sense).

Is this normal or something I should try to change?
author: justAnother_human

answers.answerContent:
Absolutely normal. Even if your mind decided that you don't want to have sex, it doesn't mean that your body doesn't want to.

It means that you really love your girl, and when she shows signs of reciprocity about this, parts of your brain will get excited.

No need to worry, with time, your body will learn how to react. It is not that you not love her anymore or that you love her less, it is just your body getting used to these sensations. Like when a medicine starts kicking in.
answers.author: poorptajustAnother_human

title: Can someone help me with my life?
question:
I have no Idea where to start, December 1-2020, My girlfriend left me for a guy and didn't even bothered to tell the reason behind it. Still I don't know. I changed my career and left my passion and hobbies just to take care of her and almost spent around 600 dollars per month just for the sake of her daily needs. Later I heard from one of my friends that she's been sleeping with a lot of dudes from her college when we were in a relationship. The day she left me is the same day I lost my dad. I couldn't even bring myself all together, Yet still I somehow managed to accept all of this and tried to bring back my life together. I started hitting the gym, had a healthy lifestyle and a clean work routine.

Last month she texted me and asked me to take her back as her new boyfriend left her. Ever since she texted, I'm no longer focused of my goals and I'm always waiting for her text. I tried apply for 3 grad schools and got rejected from all of em and I also got fired from my job last week, even though it was my seniors mistake. I'm severely addicted to porn and I can't stop doing it. I try to work hard and keep myself positive all the time, Still I haven't been able to cross this rough path. I don't have any friends or family to advice me through this. I don't know what to do. I'm tired. I wanna go somewhere and never return. I just wanna be happy.. is there any ways I can regain my happiness?

Thanks for your time :)

answers.answerContent:
I would have to say she is not good for you and you should not focus on her. You need a reset, just let yourself have some fun. If you enjoy the gym, focus on that and try to get back into  the hobbies you left. Look for something that you always wanted to try. Of course the lost job is an issue, can you go back to your original career?

I was married to a woman that was all about herself and didn't ever care about anyone else's interest. She sucked the life out of me but i was too focused on her to see it at the time. When she decided to leave  my whole life seemed to just stop. I ended up in a hospital for 7 days for "Stress". They did help me understand that you can't be so focused on someone else and not take care of yourself. You are no good to anyone else if you are messed up. The gym and healthy lifestyle are a great start.

Of course i'm just a random person on the network and have no clue about you other than what you posted. Find a way to have some fun.
answers.author: imhim

answers.answerContent: just concentrate on the positive things you have accomplished after your girlfriend and try to go out for walks and hikes. about the porn thing try to consume it in a reading material. just keep positive.

Let her go. Block her number and avoid her contact at all costs.

There are plenty of fish in the sea. Just organize and put yourself in a good mental state before go fishing again.
answers.author: poorpta

answers.answerContent:
Dude, you deserve way better than her. It sounds like your affection and love for her is not matched by her at all. It's going to be hard, but you need to move on to someone that will give you the love and respect you deserve.

I've also been in some dark places and know how hard it can be. Just focus on one small thing you can do today, and do it. It may be calling one place looking for an interview, work out for an hour, stop yourself from watching porn, or just getting out of bed even if you really don't want to. You might not do those things the next day or even mess up later that same day, but that's ok. It doesn't matter if you aren't perfect or super productive all day; just get that one thing done and freakin celebrate. Focus on the good you are doing to work towards a better self. Just getting on here and being so open about this shows your devotion to bettering yourself and shows you are really trying.

I believe in you man. You got this.
answers.author: justAnother_human

answers.answerContent: Hey friend, don't feel sad of what happened to you in past. Because your bad past will never trouble you again, it's gone. So don't spoil your present worrying about it. Don't even worry of what will happen to you tomorrow or in future. The best way to feel happy is to accept what comes to you in life, it may be good or bad, but your attitude of accepting it, must be positive. Take the name of Krishna or Jesus or Allah or any other form of God you follow. Be happy my friend, because the bad past will never return, the bad present will certainly end in future, and the bad future cannot last longer than death. So keep smiling my friend.
answers.author: Chaitanya.Mahaprabhu

answers.answerContent:
Hello Buddy, A huge advice for you: Don't give people more than their size, if she left you .. f*** it so what .. she is not the only woman in this world  .. you can find another one and who knows maybe she gonna be more perfect than here

So bud if you are not on the top list #1 just don't be below .. first or not.. find another one it's not that hard
answers.author: mrdeepwebmrdeepweb

answers.answerContent: bro love yourself, help others. don't expect anything from anyone . just move on . live on present.not past

It don't sound like she was a good fit for you. Remove her from your life altogether. You didn't mention anything about kids so that's a huge plus in your case. Try to go out with someone else even if its just a friend. I know its hard but you need to focus on rebuilding your life. I've always struggled to be happy myself even when all is good. Maybe a change of venue would do you some good. Start over somewhere new.

answers.answerContent:
got her pregnant and dump her :D (jk) you can try to find ''friend group/crowd'' It may feel good to know that you are not alone in public, you can look and judge everyone and you can compare with yourself and find people who are worse off than you

title: Help
question: Hello, I want to escape my country and home. I don't like my parents and sister, they are religious and believe in heaven. I don't want to live with my parents and my country, I want to escape, I don't have money, I want to go to the USA. I want to live with normal people who understand life and have money. Help me please.

answers.answerContent: You will have to find some way to get money at least to escape your country
answers.author: Yeager

comments.comment: It would be better if I disappeared from the country and family and because I don't want to live in a corrupt country and a Muslim country and family and I'm tired of the rules and laws of this country and family

answers.answerContent: If your only reason for leaving is because your family is religious, re-evaluate your priorities. If that religious belief comes with threat of anti-gay or anti-* violence, then this is a little more understandable, but this wasn't mentioned in the original post. If you just want to go to the USA because people have money there, re-evaluate your priorities. Moving for economic growth is normal, but moving simply because you want to "live with normal people who understand life and have money" is kinda a bad idea. All that I'm saying is that this is a huge decision and you should have a really good reason for sacrificing so much for this.

title: tell me a story
question: bored someone tell me anything like
author: hellothere9293

answers.answerContent:
One time, me and my buddy went deer hunting. We never did it before and he was a phsychology major so we weren't really the type for it. Because of this, he came up with the weirdest idea: spend some time making a deer trust us and then once it gets close enough and docile enough, kill it quietly so we don't startle other deer in the area (keeping their trust).

So he got dressed up in this shrub outfit, rubbed himself down in mud to mask his scent, and put some beef jerky around him on the floor. He did this for a few days, same time, same place, and same arangment of food and it looked like there was at least one regular visitor each day. On the 5th day (yes it took this long) he finally went for the kill (with a knife), but the thing that he didn't know about killing with a knife is that it's way harder than the movies. You have to let it bleed out a bit and really get a good placed stab in in order to down it. You also need to constrain it otherwise it will run away. Anyways, he didn't know any of this and I already gave up on him so he failed pretty bad. He got the knife in, but the deer kicked him pretty hard and got away, screaming and running really loudly.

That was the first and last time he went hunting with me XD
answers.author: justAnother_human

comments.comment: nice story man if that deer survived he ain't gonna trust anyone in his life again XD
comments.author: hellothere9293

title: How this works?
question: is the ukrain war going to stop soon?
author: kevinlomax

answers.answerContent:
*conspiracy theory rant warning*

No one knows; all I have is speculation. But from my knowledge there's a couple things that are a little weird. It seems that russia is using way less power, resources, and strategy than they could be. From really stupid clumping of resources (easy air target), to just slow advances and low numbers, something seems off. It could be to perpetuate russian propoganda saying how bad ukraine is (war wasting lots of resources) and eventually justify using dramatic measures (nuke, more civilian targeting, etc). Or it could be an excuse for putin to exert some crazy "emergency" power over russians to "stabalize the economy". Idk if it will be as bad as hitler level control, but russia is already pretty totalitarian. So in either case it will have to go on for a bit more to strain resources enough to justify either or both actions.

These are all just posibilities though, and I'm just a crazy tin foil hat but you asked.
answers.author: justAnother_human

answers.answerContent: Zelenski and Putin are not planning to stop that. They both know that they are only losing so i think there is something behind scene that we don't know. I think this is all planned and we are too small to ask those questions.
answers.author: Tartiph
