I would say just get as much evidence of her craziness (screen shots, witnesses, etc) and maybe report her for stalking or something. Get enough evidence where it would be impossible for her to make any case against him. It sounds like he has at least a couple other witnesses (although you can spread the word to more guys) and quite a bit of past things from her that are really solid and not disputable. Get a restraining order on her and be as close to your friend as you can to protect him if she comes again.

I really value human life, so I will say that you do everything in your power to make sure it doesn't come to you guys killing her. At the very least, it would throw you guys in jail because you don't have a great cover for that; and yall don't want to go there. Even if she comes at him, I would try to really stay away from killing her. Taking a life (no matter how crazy) is never a fun thing and it really sits with you.

Keep safe brother, I think you guys have a good case against her.

title: Spy on my wife using the router WiFi
question:
Hello,

I'm going through a bad separation, My wife want to take my children from me, and she started an affair with another man.
I have access to the main router in the house with the password, And I see that she bought new number and IPhone 11 to be secured,

How can obtain proofs from the router on her cheating?

 Or How can spy on that router ?

Please help me in this
author: larie550

answers.answerContent:
you can spy on it. That's called sniffing traffic + ARP poisoning. You can see almost every thing your wife is doing on her phone. NetworkChuck has great video on that theme

Link of video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-rSqbgI7oZM

this one is useful too: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hl0IpoS503A
answers.author: Tartiph

comments.comment:
Thank you so much, I was looking for some tool or website that can get the job easier
thank you
comments.author: larie550

comments.comment: can i use this to spy on the neigbours
comments.author: lil ghost

answers.answerContent:
1. TL;DR - not really. You could see what websites she is visiting (by manipulating/spoofing DNS), but you won't be able to see the content of her browsing or messaging. Today, Man-In-The-Middle ("MITM") is basically ineffective, tutorials on this topic are either out of date of use contrived examples. What they show will not work on Facebook, Google,  Whatsapp etc, which is probably what your wife is using to communicate.

2. Any evidence of "cheating" you obtain this way cannot be used in court because you obtained it illegally. Forget hacking and focus on practical legal issues with lawyers. Maybe get a PI to follow her to get the evidence you need, photos with another man in public are legal.

answers.answerContent: WiFi jamming is easy, though modern WPA3 implementations largely avoid the issue. It's relatively new, so your school may still be on WPA2. TL;DR go download mdk3 on your laptop (aireplay-ng also works, but a little less straightforward. Good for targeted attacks). It has a mass deauth function, which blasts out a bunch of forged control frames that look like they're coming from the access point, telling the client to disconnect and reconnect. Get enough of them in a row, and the client will stay disconnected. Outside of WPA3, there is no easy mitigation for this kind of attack, though depending on how high budget your school's IT guys are, they may be able to physically locate you if you do this in 1 spot for too long

title: what can I do to get back motivation and improve my life?
question:
I lost motivation somewhere in my life. I stopped doing some work for college and feel lost in life. This was because I couldn't really find luck getting a job after trying. Things don't work out for me in life. There were some things that brought pain, but it was not physical. I wanted to do some stuff, but lost motivation since it didn't work out.

I was doing good in school but stopped because I didn't see other things change for me. I wanted to learn some skills to do something helpful in the world, but couldn't do it. Other people seem to be doing better. I can't figure out how to improve.

I need guidance in life and feel lost. I can't earn the minimum pay and get into jobs. There is no desire to go after a job since it won't work and hasn't for a long time. I have lost money and been robbed, some online and one time when buying a car that didn't work. I don't want to talk about what I need help with specifically, but might so someone can understand.

answers.answerContent: bro needs help, psychological, but I guess you won't have the support to allow it, I don't know if you live with your parents, you have to find some motivation if you don't you'll never get anything, look for something you like, that you're passionate about what you'd get up and you would be working all day and so tirelessly, also look for small goals that are realistic and you can meet, I don't know your situation in general so this help is not very specific, but look for something you like, learn and work from it , earn money, life is a mountain and the aspiration of people is to improve their quality of life, climb socially and position themselves as far ahead of the other best, that can only be achieved with money and fame, which normally goes hand in hand Good luck and if you need talks baby here we are.
answers.author: figueras7

answers.answerContent: introspection  my friend get a deeper understanding of your self. read a book invest in your mental health. set small achievable goals you can work towards believe in your self,
answers.author: lil ghost

answers.answerContent:
Find something that matters to you (figueras7 answer was pretty good). Use that to make a goal for yourself and my answer will hopefully help you get there.

A mile is not conqured in a single jump, but rather a thousand steps. Find just one thing you can do a day and do it. If it be doing laundry, 10 pushups, or anything else that's small but needed. Build those into habits, just focusing in on one habit at a time, and you'll eventually be the person you want to be. Habitica is a fun app that helps building habits and there are a number of other game-ify habits apps out there.

I'm kinda in a similar boat to you so I've been asking the same questions. One thing that has helped me is finding something I would fight for and a deadline. For me it's a girlfriend and trying to be a better person for her (i have some specifics) by the end of this month.
answers.author: justAnother_human

answers.answerContent:
just make a routine. Find side hustle, party a bit, work out... that's it...

and yes, music.
answers.author: Tartiph

answers.answerContent:
Well, seems you've got some good suggestive psychological & philosophical aspect of it. Let's talk about taking them on grounds in real day to day life. To help you in real, need some answers.

Question - your favt. actor/actress and what genre of cinema you enjoy most?

Answer this. Rest will follow.

you can't achieve anything in life without self-discipline, unfortunately...it is a long path filled with unpleasant things like 5 am alarms, tears, disappointments, sacrifices, rejections, growth mindset, sleepless nights, etc.

good luck.

title: What Is The Most Safe And Lucrative Crime To Commit?

answers.answerContent:
The most important thing is to find people who needs a certain thing and take advantage of the situation. Example: Get weed for the low to sell it back at higher price to stoners (a zip of 28g for 80$ and sell the g for 10$ or 2.5g for 20$ example). Sell fake designer to people who wants designer but are too broke to buy the real thing so you make them think you're selling them real ones (you can make fake receipt (what i was doing)). Sell fake iphone (you can find some for 200$ and sell it for 1000$+).

If you want to make it a side hustle for a long term or even a short term and wanna keep it safe, you need to find someone who's gonna be in the front scene, sell it for you, and you become a plug now. You're now in the backstage so you're risking less but also earning less. After you make your hustle bigger.

I used to legit give 20% to a girl to sell fake shoes for me because she was white and had a nice car so people would believe her more. Sometimes I was making 1k per week doing this. But sometimes I was doing 0$ in a month out of this jugg. My friend made 3k for selling 2 fake iphone 13 pro max because they're sealed so some people buy it as a gift and don't test it.

Never had any problem, only when people are doubting, they don't buy but don't do shit. I only received some text of people telling me I've sold them fake and I just block them.

If you grow it big enough, you find a second person so you can find more customers for your product, etc etc.

Good luck

answers.answerContent:
Just don't!!!!!

If you want to download something from Pirate Bay, you must install Utorrent first.
But... yes... there is a "But"... Utorrent is a P2P (peer-to-peer) communication software and it's used to connect directely to someone else and download some files from a "someone else's" computer. If someone look on that connection, you risk to be in a big trouble... You should use a good VPN for sure (not something inexpensive or free!).

In facts, don't use it!!!!

Downloading from Dark Web (with tor browser) and a VPN is better. Tor (The Onion Router) use many relays before the server (It's a good thing) and the VPN fully encrypt the communication in/out of your computer (Another good thing!).

In conclusion... Download something from darkweb of clear net with Tor and a VPN.

Add: You should use a Linux Operating System. (A bit less virus)
Add: You should boot your Linux on a Bootable Live CD or Bootable Live USB Drive. (No risk for your data from hard drive if you don't have any!!)

title: The best way to cheat in exams
question: An innovative and new way of cheating

answers.answerContent:
Here you have some:



- With a skirt, put the paper on the inside part of it and fold it lightly, most teachers wont look there, its easy to hide and even if they do look there, they wont tell for obvious reasons.

- With a big hoodie, pit it in the front pocket, glued (try not to harm the hoodie tho lol) and look at it when you need an answer.

- With a pencil draw some info with tiny letter on the table, on the borders of it, and just in case, put your arms crossed on top of it when the teacher gives you the exam, when you finish, secretly brush it of with your hand.

- Cough, a lot, and ask if you can please get a tissue from your backpack, don't put the answers in the tissues, teachers already know that one, show them that they are clear, put the answers on the inside part of your mask, and look at them when you take it off to blow your nose.

- This one is kind of risky but may work, so you need a friend from another class, they will press the fire alarm button while you are on the exam and all the class will have to leave, they will probably set the exam for another day, but you will know what questions you'll be asked and you'll have it much easier.

- Put a paper in the bin, say you have to go sharpen your pencil, look at the questions, pretty simple.

- Test type exam? You and a friend will make a "language", first, you will tap the desk (lightly, so only both of you notice) the number of the question, question 1,, 1 tap, 2, two taps, 3, three taps... Then, you will put your hand holding your head with the number of the answer, if its A, one finger, B, two fingers, C three fingers, D, four fingers and E, the whole hand, make it look as of you are thinking and be really cautious not to get noticed.

title: iCloud locked for security reasons
question:
I lost access to my old iCloud account a few years ago. My ex boyfriend got rid of my phone when he caught me talking to my sister. I was able to get into my iCloud account maybe 2-3 years ago.

I’ve been trying for months to get into this account just to get the pictures off of it. My cousin just passed not to long ago we were close growing up and there’s pictures of him :(.

I made this account probably 10-11 years ago when I thought I would never loose access to the account. So now 10 years and serval head injuries and a major car accident later, I have no idea what the heck I made the recovery information be. I feel like such an idiot!!

I don’t know what the recovery email is just that it starts with an M.

I have no clue the answers to the security questions are.

I don’t have any device that the account will recognize.

I do know what the phone number that was linked to the account is but I have no access too it anymore.

This is going to be impossible and I’ll probably never get into the account ever again. I’ve tried to apple they can’t help me.

If anyone has any suggestions or ideas on how to get in I would appreciate you forever    I
author: Whybie

title: Life in shambles
question:
So for the past while I feel that I've been addicted to Youtube, I don't value school, and don't prioritize hanging out with people. I think I use youtube as distraction from stress. I am in university rn. I don't have many friends and want to prioritize hanging out with people more.

Help with any of these would be great.
author: justAnother_human

answers.answerContent: When life feels stagnant, its normal to find distractions in order to avoid depression, alienation and worthlessness. But unless you don't start trying, you won't be able to get out of it :) Start with lets say, fight someone whom you can start a conversation with, and slowly try befriending them. Join some social work center, or try to get into activities that your university performs. You'll slowly have to open up to the society thats around you in order for them to absorb you as one of them. You're what you make of yourself and there is no denying that at times life seems to not give you an option. But you'll have to try if you really want to change things around you. If you try really hard, in a matter of a month, you might atleast make a friend which is enough for a new start. Try out new things, places, maybe just be around people, or study hard and try interacting in class. You need to start somewhere so why not start looking for an opportunity thats popular and available around you.
answers.author: IlluminatedjustAnother_human

comments.comment:
I think this addresses the root that i didn't really think about. i really struggle with human connection (as many of us do) and i didn't really think of it as a cause for other stuff. i also like how realistic and small scale your solution was.
idk what to say but i just wanted to point out how great this answer was.
comments.author: justAnother_human

answers.answerContent:
Most of us have been there. It's not a fun place to be. "My life is in shambles" is a bit extra though, it's not as gloomy as you'd think.

What do you watch on Youtube? It doesn't have to be a timesink, there are a bunch of channels that make some really interesting content. VSauce doesn't post much anymore, but he has some very mentally stimulating content. SmarterEveryDay makes some really high quality, albeit infrequent, uploads. If you're interested in space like me, Scott Manley very frequently makes videos about space news. Same with Anton Petrov, though his are a lot more in-depth and specific. You may be surprised, watching stuff like that sparked a hobby of astrophotography for me, which is a fantastic conversation topic. You can learn a lot by just wandering around the internet, and using that knowledge will help you in real life

title: how to hack a wifi

answers.answerContent:
Like another user stated, depends what you're trying to do. DDoSing WiFi is pretty straight forward (see mdk3 or aireplay-ng), but anything else you'll actually need ACCESS to the network. Getting access is maybe more straightforward than you'd think. WPA2 is the most common encryption standard right now, though WPA3 is new and solves a lot of the vulnerabilities I'm about to discuss.

Go download your favorite Linux distro, Kali Linux will come pre-loaded with these tools. There are some programs like Wifite that try to automate this process, but there's a library of tools called aircrack-ng that will let you mess around with WiFi. The basic theory of cracking a WPA2 WiFi password is that if you record the packet transaction when an authorized client connects to the network, you can save the hashed password for the network (done with airodump-ng). Once you have that saved locally, you can start to brute force the password using a wordlist like rockyou.txt (comes with Kali) or Crackstation's list (downloadable online, much larger). This step is done with aircrack-ng. The technique isn't perfect, if the password is complex enough, it probably won't be in the wordlist. But if it is in the wordlist, aircrack-ng will stop and tell you when the password matches up with the hash.

In an absolutely ideal world, the wifi network you're trying to hack is WEP. This is almost certainly not the case, unless the access point is 15 years old and nobody has bothered to update it since. But there's a flaw in WEP's rng that allows an attacker to passively collect a bunch of data frames and reverse the rng to resolve the encryption key. On a sufficiently busy network, this process takes like 5 minutes, and can also be done with aircrack-ng
answers.author: FlamingOctopus

title: Life in shambles
question:
So for the past while I feel that I've been addicted to Youtube, I don't value school, and don't prioritize hanging out with people. I think I use youtube as distraction from stress. I am in university rn. I don't have many friends and want to prioritize hanging out with people more.

Help with any of these would be great.
author: justAnother_human

answers.answerContent: When life feels stagnant, its normal to find distractions in order to avoid depression, alienation and worthlessness. But unless you don't start trying, you won't be able to get out of it :) Start with lets say, fight someone whom you can start a conversation with, and slowly try befriending them. Join some social work center, or try to get into activities that your university performs. You'll slowly have to open up to the society thats around you in order for them to absorb you as one of them. You're what you make of yourself and there is no denying that at times life seems to not give you an option. But you'll have to try if you really want to change things around you. If you try really hard, in a matter of a month, you might atleast make a friend which is enough for a new start. Try out new things, places, maybe just be around people, or study hard and try interacting in class. You need to start somewhere so why not start looking for an opportunity thats popular and available around you.
answers.author: IlluminatedjustAnother_human

comments.comment:
I think this addresses the root that i didn't really think about. i really struggle with human connection (as many of us do) and i didn't really think of it as a cause for other stuff. i also like how realistic and small scale your solution was.
idk what to say but i just wanted to point out how great this answer was.
comments.author: justAnother_human

answers.answerContent:
Most of us have been there. It's not a fun place to be. "My life is in shambles" is a bit extra though, it's not as gloomy as you'd think.

What do you watch on Youtube? It doesn't have to be a timesink, there are a bunch of channels that make some really interesting content. VSauce doesn't post much anymore, but he has some very mentally stimulating content. SmarterEveryDay makes some really high quality, albeit infrequent, uploads. If you're interested in space like me, Scott Manley very frequently makes videos about space news. Same with Anton Petrov, though his are a lot more in-depth and specific. You may be surprised, watching stuff like that sparked a hobby of astrophotography for me, which is a fantastic conversation topic. You can learn a lot by just wandering around the internet, and using that knowledge will help you in real life

title: What does happiness mean to you?
question: A question frequently asked but never answered properly :) Lets see what the community thinks about it.. What does happiness mean to you personally..?
author: Illuminated

answers.answerContent:
i think that this is the hardest question to answer... There is no knowledge that can explain happiness, no formula, no code, no cheats.

Mostly people will say money, love, house, drugs, parties...

For me, happiness is having nobody. Being alone but not feeling like you are alone. Sitting in dark with peace in your mind, not fighting while you are thinking, but talking to yourself in some day. So my answer is inner peace. Once you got that, you'll be able to learn anything, earn unlimited money, just everything.

title: how to learn to make anime?
question:
I want to learn how to make some anime characters. Maybe somewhere on the dark web has some information where I can learn this. Creating drawings and art is not easy for me, but I want to learn how to make unique anime art.

answers.author: GoryPastel

answers.answerContent:
Look into graphic design and art classes around you if you want. If you wanna DIY it, pull up YouTube, Pinterest, whatever the hell you want and find a couple references. Start practicing basic anatomy and the generic anime artstyle to start, and when you get a hang of that then you can start building on your own style. If you don't want to do it on paper, I'll suggest a couple of free (and not free) illustrator apps:

- Medibang Paint (Free, PC) : Works pretty well, a bit complicated but easy to figure out

- Sketchbook (Free, PC/Mobile) : Basic sketch/drawing app. One of my favorites still tbh

- Sketchable (Free, PC) : Open canvas drawing app, similar to Sketchbook

- Ibis Paint or whatever its called (Mobile) : Very good app, many brushes and tools

- Krita (Free, PC) : Similar to Clip Studio but free version, complicated but useful

- Adobe Illustrator (Buy, PC) : Fucking expensive but good app besides being from Adobe

- Clip Studio Paint (Buy, PC) : Also expensive as hell but used by most comic creators. Lots of tools plus an animation creator thing, plus a marketplace w/ free things made by other users. Fantastic app just hellishly expensive



With digital art you can use a mouse (hard as fuck imo tho), buy a touchscreen laptop, or buy a drawing tablet plus stylus to just plug into your computer. Take your time learning, make it fun, fuck around and find yourself a style you like

author: NewDevice

answers.answerContent:
Mexico borders the most evil nation in the world. There you have a path (long and dangerous). Otherwise, the only legal way is to save and buy a plane ticket to Bads1 (USA) or Bad2 (EU). I have many Latin friends all over the world and what I can tell you is that it's hard at first, but they've all gotten better and they can send money to the family.

If you want to do it for real and legally, work hard, save as much as you can, only spend on food, no weed, no alcohol, no tobacco. You will need every wasted cent, and seek legal advice (outside Latin America, 75% will scam you there) and fight for what you want.

If you are a minor you cannot without the authorization of your parents.
go vacation somewhere in europe. don't return, create a new identity

title: Voices instead my head
question:
I always joke about this with other people but i have these voices in my head roaring at me the most inhumane things that can be imagined , almost everyday

anyone else relate? What should I do? Any thoughts on this?
author: GoryPastelGoryPastel

answers.answerContent:
It depends on the degree to which you listen to it, we usually always have is a voice in our head, it is nothing more than our conscience saying, questioning or fueling.

When what the conscience says or those voices are not consistent with the right thing it is good to visit a psychologist and see what the problem is, what situation or trauma can we be affecting us.
answers.author: GrecoGoryPastel

comments.comment: I don't do anything for a living at the moment, the only idea I have is that I listen to really heavy/death metal music which is one of my suspensions and I tend to overthink so much it becomes a voice stuck in my head, I do not engage in any demonic rituals nor take any illicit substance.
comments.author: GoryPastel

answers.answerContent: Hmm. Can I ask what you do for a living, or honestly things about you. I've heard of cases like these happen with people that actively engage with "demonic" or "evil" acts, at least that is what they name such acts to be. They consider it a "demon". An example of this possible theory is that, there is an actor which shouldn't be named, which engages into "demonic" acts often, "child abuse", "drugs", "rituals", and other such acts. "Drugs" can have an impact on your brain and cause you to see/hear things that shouldn't be there. While engaging into anything "satanic" or "demonic" potentially might cause such thing to occur. My personal advice is to stay away from potential "demonic acts" for now. If that isn't the case, "drug overdoses" can potentially cause it too. Hope this helped! Stay safe friend.

comments.comment: I don't do anything for a living at the moment, the only idea I have is that I listen to really heavy/death metal music which is one of my suspensions and I tend to overthink so much it becomes a voice stuck in my head, I do not engage in any demonic rituals nor take any illicit substance.
comments.author: GoryPastel

answers.answerContent: Same to me there's nothing wrong with them, they just don't shut up
answers.author: Ross

comments.comment: I don't do anything for a living at the moment, the only idea I have is that I listen to really heavy/death metal music which is one of my suspensions and I tend to overthink so much it becomes a voice stuck in my head, I do not engage in any demonic rituals nor take any illicit substance.
comments.author: GoryPastel

answers.answerContent:
Keep ignoring them. Almost all of us have those thoughts. For some they are thoughts, for others whispers, and those who suffer them most intensely can become shouting voices.

I advise you not to cross the line. If you do it and you don't like it it will be horrible, and if you like it you will become something you don't want to be right now.

It crosses our minds to break the neck of someone very heavy just to make them shut up, or push a grandmother to the train track, or smash a new mother against the ground with her baby just to see what people's faces or to see what would happen.

They are called borderline thoughts and everyone has them, although some are afraid to admit it.

If you really have a mental illness and you have awareness and control over it, you can cope without medication.
Watch the movie "a beautiful mind", it will cheer you up.

comments.author: GoryPastel

answers.answerContent:
Tbh all of us sometimes get that, but you should seek for help. If you FEEL "shadow voices", whispering and etc. that are first symptoms of schizophrenia. I know some pills that you could buy in every pharmacy without recipe, but you should first check what is going on.

Wish you the best and stay strong :)

title: How to bypass 2-factor authentication of instagram?
question:
I'm trying to get into a person instagram account and after a lot of trying I manage to gets hands on password of linked facebook account and gmail account and also able to logged into both gmail and fb account but instagram have 2 factor authentication turned on which will trigger an message on phone everytime I try to login any way!

Is there any way I can turn off 2 factor authentication or able to login into instagram using facebook or gmail??
author: anam

answers.answerContent: it isn't possible. I used to redirect 2fa messages to me with inspect element on not well-protected websites because (back then) you could just change the email/phone number from source code (only for you) and receive it. Today you can only do that on pretty outdated websites or CTFs lol.
answers.author: Tartiphanam

answers.answerContent: The only times I've seen someone bypass 2FA was with zero-day vulnerability...
answers.author: Mae Borowski

answers.answerContent:
That's what 2FA was designed for, so you can't.
An intelligent person could use social engineering so that the victim reveals the code to you.
Someone more lazy could drug the victim to use his fingerprint or cut off his finger (does anyone know if mobile fingerprint readers can read the fingerprint of a dead person? It came to my head writing this bullshit), in addition to stealing the mobile. Make sure you have the fingerprint reader enabled if you haven't made a fool of yourself.

The best thing would be not to do it and respect privacy, which was the only thing we had left a few years ago...

I please, if you are going to use it with someone who obsesses you or for sexual purposes (whether it is a woman or a man), please, do not do it, I think that it increases the ego more to learn to flirt (no matter how ugly you are, the ugly we flirt much more than you think), that not ending up flirt having an advantage or forcing someone.

author: FakerSucks

it actually is easy. Easier than it sounds. You just need to have some money to invest into it (to buy new phone number, and to not owe dealers for their stuff) and also first you need few friends that use weed. If you give them more weed at start, for example they pay for 3g and you give them 4g, they will keep buying even more amounts than they did. Also they will bring friends. Parties are good idea but for parties you will need few people with you to protect you, to bring people to you and etc. Also keep in mind some people just randomly might beat you and take your stuff away from you, so you will always need coworkers that will share profit and that are really really loyal to you.

Weapon is actually mostly needed, but avoid to use it unless you are really dying.

I wish you luck, and don't let everyone know you got weed, don't bring huge amounts with you outside, don't stash it in your own apartment and always be paranoid. Police can be on every corner and any moment they can jump in your apartment or search you outside while you got stuff on yourself. Make a plan how to avoid being searched and hiding weed outside

title: Who came up with the idea of deepweb?
question: Who came up with the idea of deepweb? A person, government, or organization?
author: matthewkirby

answers.answerContent: The Deep Web is a part of the World Wide Web that is not indexed by search engines. No person created the Deep Web separately (the internet was created by DARPA). Instead, it formed as a place for illegal activities as they spread on the web. When ARPANET was still around, it was tied to the government. To make it into a public and private internet, ARPANET's founders split it into 2 internets. The ARPANET would evolve into the modern clear net, while another version, MILNET would evolve into the deep web. The Deep Web was initially meant for bypassing government censorship, but evolved into what we now know today. Tor browser evolved into the main gateway for the Deep Web.
answers.author: Victor Frankenstein

title: How to finess a kid into giving me his Apple ID password?
question:
Ok so a little backstory. Around in Jun 2022 I found an iPhone 13 pro max on the curb. I obviously took it and went into a hidden place and popped out the SIM card to stop it from beeping (the owner activated lost mode). I put the SIM card into my burner android and read the number on it, then I did a reverse phone number search and I found out who it belonged to. Long story short, I found the owners' address and Facebook account. Turns out it belongs to a teenage kid. I tried different passcode attempts but I got permanently locked out. So I reset the phone and now it's stuck in activation lock. My friend who used to live across from the kid had some info about the kid on his phone. I know this because I went through his phone when he was asleep and I found the kid's AppleID email. All I need now is the kid's password. I know his Snapchat and I have him added on my alt account. But the kid is the only one living in that house that doesn't gave any social media besides Snapchat (as far as I know). I searched his name on every social media I could think of and I found nothing. His mom, dad, and sibling all have at least two social media accounts. Just not him. Remember, I already have the *****@icloud.com address. I just need the password and I'll be in his phone.

I know some things about this kid, such as the exact date he was born, what school he used to go to, and his personal phone number (as well as other phone number belonging to various members of this family). I also have his sibling's TikTok and Instagram, as well as his mom's Facebook and his dad's Facebook, Snapchat, Tiktok, and Instagram. I know that both of his parents used to work in the military (not gonna say which branch for my own sake). I know a LOT about this family but not too much about the kid. I have a whole document written about this family on my old iPhone in the notepad. I keep track of everything I can and I stalk all their accounts every couple days.

So does anyone here have any ideas on how to finess this kid out of his password? My friend said I should talk to him, which is possible since I have him added on Snapchat, but I don't want to risk him telling his parents and them either changing the password or trying to find out where I live. Any advice would be very helpful. Until then, I'll continue stalking all accounts belonging to this family and maybe I'll even consider stalking the kid in real life to find out more about him.
author: mercykilla177

answers.answerContent: well what is the gain in doing all of this, wont your time be spent more wisely hacking the parents and hitting their accounts? any way youll have to use social engineering if you cant think of any possible passwords, i cant say everything here but pm me for more info. I think stalking him in real life is not it, how will you go about that even? youll wait till he logs into his apple id? and then take photos?

title: I have a big problem with my parents, what should I do?
question:
Before I ask my question, I need to set the context.

On Wednesday, I spent a very good part of the day, at the end of the morning of classes at the college, a supervisor I'm friends with drove me and my crush (person you have romantic feelings for) downtown in his car (then went home).

From noon to 2pm we stayed in town and ate at Five Guys.

The origin of this outing was group work, therefore we went to her place. At her place we laid in bed, started by relaxing and watching Breaking Bad, and also vaped.

During this time, I received many calls and messages from my parents, as I seem to have told them that I would be home around 4pm.

After a few hours, we started the group work, which consisted of making a video, therefore we wrote the text with ChatGPT and we still had to record the video.

After several different takes that were messed up, I got a call from my dad, which I decided to answer, still with my crush next to it.

On the phone, my dad yelled at me like I had done something really stupid. I was supposed to take the bus home after work, but he considered that the time was so traditional that he had to go look for me. I have to say that I didn't tell him I was at a girl's house, my family is very religious and they consider it a sin. I had said that I was at a male friend's house, living much further away than my crush's house, the latter only lives 5 minutes walk from my house. He decided to pick me up at the false address of my so-called male friend where I was staying.

After this call, I was very anxious and stressed. I didn't laugh once during the shooting of the video.

Once the group work was over, I went home, vaping on the way back.

To get home faster, I ran, which caused me to be slightly out of breath.

When I got to the front of my house, I texted my dad that I had arrived home. He had already arrived at the wrong address I had given him.

I felt even more anxious and stressed as I walked through the door of my house. Once I arrived home, around 7pm (but my parents consider this time very late) my mother was waiting for me.

I went up to my room to wait for the meal to be ready.

I have to say that in town I bought an iPhone, but my parents don't want me to have a phone (simplified context).

I was in a big hurry to unpack it and set it up, but after a few minutes, I heard my mom coming up the stairs. I immediately scrambled to hide my iPhone under my pillow. My mom opened the door to my room, and I think that's what got me into trouble.

I stood in front of my bed, as if I had something to hide, I don't remember if my posture really showed if I wanted to hide something.

Anyway, once my dad got home, I was eating. He quickly yelled at me but said very little and went to watch TV.

Once the meal was over, I went back to my room to finish setting up my iPhone.



Today was Sunday, in the late afternoon, my parents proposed me to go and eat something for four o'clock; in reality it was a real ambush.

We went to Germany, because we live near the German border, to eat in a « cofee and cake ».

We ordered and sat down at the table, after a while I started not to be hungry anymore so I decided to go to the bathroom.

When I come back to the table, my mother starts talking to me about how bad this week was, and decides to tell me about what happened on Wednesday.

I think she really prepared her speech, because it was neat, clear and concise.

She starts with a short introduction with no real disturbing phrases. Then she moves on to what I would call "offensive." She starts by telling me that when I came home Wednesday night I was very pale and different, and that the next day, Thursday, I was still very pale and had huge dark circles.



Why I was pale and different: because I was very anxious and stressed, and certainly because of a nicotine shot

The next day: because I didn't sleep much, I was busy configuring and testing my iPhone

She told me, I quote "that she suspected me to have made an experiment" and "that sometimes when you are young you want to test something" only implied sentences of this kind.

My mother has a Lechere antenna (Google definition: https://www.google.com/search?q=lecher+antenna+definition). Basically she asks a question in her head, and the antenna answers with "yes" or "no" by tilting or not.

She probably asked a question like "did my son do something weird on Wednesday" or "did my son smoke cannabis" or "did my son go to a seance" or "did my son do something he has never done before".

I have never smoked or used cannabis, let alone gone into spiritualism.

My mother is very vicious and paranoid.



Why did I make these assumptions?



My father had already found puffs (disposable electronic cigarettes) in my room a few months ago and had pointed them out to me in a very subtle way. He had put a felt pen in the bag that contained the puffs (there had never been a felt pen in that bag before, which made me notice that someone had been there).

A week ago, I got an offer from a friend on the internet to be a cannabis courier, basically I just have to receive packages at home and give them to him. I would have been paid 200€.



As this is impossible at home, I asked my crush, who has much less strict parents. She still refused after I told her what was in the packages.

Only she told one of her friends. He threatened to tell my parents and the principal if I didn't give him a puff. I never gave in because I know he has no proof.

Maybe he looked up my parents' number on Facebook or in the phone book and informed my parents.



What do you think I should do?

Thank you for your answers and for reading everything.
author: oneccs

answers.answerContent:
Bro, unfortunately because your upbringing is very strict and you are still connected and dependent on your parents, I think it's better for you to stay away from some things that could affect your relationship at home, any minor problem can get worse.

If you have a plan to get out of the house, then take a chance on doing the things you really want to do.

comments.comment: how do you know ?
comments.author: oneccs

answers.answerContent:
Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies have been a topic of much debate and speculation. The future of cryptocurrencies is uncertain and their value can be highly volatile. Some people believe that cryptocurrencies have the potential to revolutionize the financial industry, while others view them as risky investments.
It's important to do your own research and make informed decisions before investing in any asset, including cryptocurrencies. As with any investment, there are risks involved and it's possible to lose money.
In terms of mining, it is possible to mine certain cryptocurrencies using specialized hardware. However, mining can be complex and may require a significant investment in equipment and electricity.
Ultimately, whether or not you choose to trust or invest in cryptocurrencies is a personal decision that depends on your individual circumstances and risk tolerance.
answers.author: oneccs

comments.author: Don

All about crypto and future 
First of all we need to understand currency which means something of value and global acceptance like dollars. But deep down, dollar is also symbolic of gold and in near future as soon as mining of precious metals will begin in space, their prices will go down drastically as there are abandon of numberless precious elements and compounds. Then economy will need something which is limited like crypto. They only have certain numbers that can be mined and in this way, they will be future gold.
But it does not mean at all that you should start investing/mining any crypto but rather you should go for something to trust like bitcoin/etherium/monero. They will never go zero but other random crypto has more chances of getting zero then going to sky.

title: who knows how to find deleted videos on the internet
author: pineapple

answers.answerContent:
Finding deleted videos on the internet can be challenging, but there are a few methods you can try:
Check your browser history: If you recently watched the video before it was deleted, you may be able to find it in your browser history.
Use the Wayback Machine: The Wayback Machine is an internet archive that takes periodic snapshots of websites. You can search for the website where the video was originally hosted and see if it was archived before it was deleted.
Search for mirrors or copies: Sometimes people will create copies or mirrors of videos and post them elsewhere on the internet. You can try searching for the video title or keywords related to the video on search engines or social media platforms to see if any copies or mirrors exist.
Contact the uploader or website owner: If you know who uploaded the video or the website where it was hosted, you can try contacting them to see if they have a backup or if they can provide you with a copy of the video.
Use specialized software: There are some specialized software tools that can help you recover deleted videos. However, these tools may not always be reliable or legal, so use them at your own risk.
It's important to note that even if you find a copy of a deleted video, sharing or distributing copyrighted material without permission is illegal and could result in legal consequences.
answers.author: Raju Bhai

title: Cooking methamphetamine for the first time
question:
Can someone explain the basic things about meth cooking and how can i start it? i have the pseudo but dunno any other things
I want to make around 3.5 ounces
author: 03wise03

answers.answerContent:
The tablets are dissolved in water, the solution is made alkaline with an aqueous base solution (NaOH,
or NaHCO3) to basic pH. This will convert the pseudoephedrine hydrochloride into
pseudoephedrine free base
The sodium salt of ibuprofen is formed from ibuprofen. Free for extraction
pseudoephedrine base, any lipophilic solvent can be used, in small boils
in the past it used petroleum ether or toluene, currently the most commonly used is medical
gasoline purchased at a pharmacy. The free base of pseudoephedrine, on shaking, passes into
solvent, while ibuprofen sodium remains in the aqueous phase.Pseudoephedrine is obtained
by evaporation of the solvent.
If the isolation is made from tablets containing paracetamol, it can be done after adding a strong base
its hydrolysis occurs with the formation of ballast substances that pass into the solvent together
with a portion of paracetamol.
REDUCTION
Pseudoephedrine is dissolved in acid, red phosphorus is added and the reaction is continued with constant stirring
heated to 80-100Â°C, then iodine is added until violet vapors are produced, after adding iodine
the reaction is allowed to proceed for another 4 hours with constant stirring. The reaction can be accelerated by adding
trichloroacetic acid as a catalyst. The reducing agent itself is PI3, which during the reaction
regenerates. After re-alkalization, it is again extracted into a lipophilic solvent, this time
already as methamphetamine, possibly after washing with dilute hydrochloric acid
methamphetamine hydrochloride. The yield varies between 50-60%. The resulting purity
of methamphetamine can reach up to 90%

title: What operating system do you use?
question: What operating system do you use, and why?
author: Casey

answers.answerContent:
I use Kali Linux because this is best 
Kali Linux is a specialized Linux distribution that is designed for cybersecurity professionals and enthusiasts. Here are some reasons why Kali Linux is considered one of the best options for cybersecurity professionals:
Pre-installed Tools: Kali Linux comes with a wide range of pre-installed tools, including penetration testing tools, wireless tools, forensics tools, and more. This makes it easier for cybersecurity professionals to quickly set up their environment and start working on their tasks.
Regular Updates: Kali Linux is regularly updated with the latest security patches and software updates, ensuring that users have access to the latest tools and technologies.
Open Source: Kali Linux is open-source software, which means that users can access and modify the source code. This makes it easier for cybersecurity professionals to customize the distribution to meet their specific needs.
Community Support: Kali Linux has a large and active community of users who are constantly developing new tools, sharing knowledge, and providing support to each other.
Easy to Use: Kali Linux is designed to be user-friendly, with a graphical user interface that makes it easy to navigate and use.
Overall, Kali Linux is considered one of the best options for cybersecurity professionals because of its extensive toolset, regular updates, open-source nature, strong community support, and ease of use.

title: What is your opinion on 'unrestricted' freedom of expression?
author: Casey

answers.answerContent:
Freedom of expression is a fundamental human right and is enshrined in many international human rights documents, such as the Universal Declaration of Human Rights. However, the question of whether freedom of expression should be unrestricted or not is a complex issue that requires careful consideration.
On the one hand, some argue that unrestricted freedom of expression is necessary for a truly democratic society, where all ideas and opinions can be freely expressed and debated without fear of censorship or reprisal. They believe that restrictions on free speech, even if well-intentioned, can lead to a slippery slope where any speech that is deemed controversial or offensive can be suppressed, leading to a chilling effect on free expression.
On the other hand, others argue that there are limits to free speech, particularly when it comes to hate speech, incitement to violence, and speech that threatens national security. They believe that such speech can be harmful and can lead to real-world consequences, such as discrimination, violence, and instability.
Ultimately, the balance between freedom of expression and restrictions on speech will depend on the specific cultural, social, and political context in which it is being applied. In many cases, laws and regulations may be needed to strike a balance between protecting free speech and preventing harm to individuals and society as a whole.

You may be struggling with a mental health issue or other factors that are contributing to your feelings, and there are many resources available to help you. title: how money laundering works
author: Bravv

answers.answerContent:
Marked lottery prizes
Bitcoin Wallet Switching to Minimize/Remove Tracking
Creation of overpriced raw material to justify excessive money
depends on the area being washed
answers.author: dudu2050

answers.answerContent:
In simple terms, money laundering is a form of financial crime that enables criminals to disguise the source of their money. The result is that 'dirty' money appears 'clean' - an outcome that can frustrate the efforts of law enforcement agencies to bring criminals to justice.
As we'll go onto explain, money laundering entails accumulating money from criminal activity, mixing it in with funds that were earned legitimately, and then filtering it back to its original source. This means that criminals can effectively 'cash out' laundered money without risking getting caught.
In many cases, laundered money is also used to finance the continued operation of criminal organisations. The practice is linked to a whole host of illegal activities, including:
General fraud
Drug trafficking
Theft and embezzlement
Tax and customs violations
Terrorist financing

For criminals, masking the source of ill-gotten gains is important since the alternative is to keep large amounts of cash. Money laundering also makes it far more difficult for the authorities to successfully prosecute criminals and seize back dirty money under the Proceeds of Crime Act.
What businesses are used for money laundering?
Money laundering schemes are complex and often have a cross-border element. In truth, all businesses are at risk of financial crimes since criminals are often inventive and are constantly finding new ways to dodge the provisions of money laundering legislation.
When it comes to money laundering, some of the most at-risk organisations include major financial institutions, casinos, firms involved in the financial services industry, and any company dealing with sizeable cash transactions.
How do money laundering schemes work?
Criminal organisations go to great lengths to disguise both the source and destination of criminally derived funds. As a result, the ways in which they launder money are constantly changing and it can be difficult for countries and businesses to keep up with the relevant legislation as it tries to keep pace with existing and emerging financial crimes.
Despite this, money laundering stages is generally thought to be carried out over three key phases: placement, layering, and integration. All typically involve suspicious activities - but that doesn't mean they're easy to spot.
Stage 1: Placement
The placement money laundering stage involves placing 'dirty' money into existing financial systems. Criminal money is moved away from the illegal activities from which it was sourced, making it appear as if it came from a legitimate source.
This might involve placing the funds in an offshore bank account, and is also known as 'washing' illegally acquired money.
Stage 2: Layering
The layering money laundering stage entails muddling laundered money through a legitimate financial system. Criminals enter into a complicated web of financial transactions to further complicate the trail that leads back to their illicit activity.
By layering money through numerous transactions and bank accounts, criminals can obscure the source of their funds and may even resort to fraudulent accounting practices to do so. Criminal proceeds may be staked at a casino or via another form of gambling, before being used to purchase securities and other assets, and then going on to be used to purchase financial products. In some cases, criminal gangs may even shuffle money through various different currencies - moving large sums of cash on an international level.
Stage 3: Integration
In the third stage of integration money laundering, criminals integrate their funds into the economy. This involves extracting the money from the complex transactions of the layering stage, and using it to make large-scale investments.
Since by now the funds appear to come from legitimate sources, it becomes possible for criminals to spend their money without raising the alarm about suspected money laundering. Often, laundered money is used to purchase property, shares, and luxury assets that make criminal money seem even more legitimate.
Examples of money laundering schemes
With a better understanding of how money laundering works in theory, firms can start to look out for signs of suspicious activity. There are a number of well-known money laundering schemes out there, and while money launderers are always looking for new ways to conduct criminal activities without getting caught, many of the schemes they use have similar features.
How criminals 'place' money into the financial system
There are countless ways for money to enter the financial system, but there are some more common ways in which criminals approach the placement stage of money laundering.
Blending of funds
This involves blending criminal finances with the takings of a legitimate business. Money launderers generally use cash-based businesses such as car washes, betting shops, bars, and tanning salons to syphon criminal funds into the market. The term money laundering actually stems from the fact that criminals historically used laundrettes to mask the proceeds of crime.
'Smurfing'
'Smurfing' is the practice of splitting a large amount of money down into smaller transactions. In doing so, criminals can make their activities seem less suspicious and prevent their transactions from crossing the reporting threshold set by anti-money laundering legislation.
Illegal funds are typically deposited into one or more bank accounts by various people (known as 'smurfs') over an extended period of time. The practice makes it seems as if the money has come from genuine legal activity, and is much harder for banks to spot than huge cash deposits.
Invoice fraud
Invoice fraud is the practice of using a business to over or under bill for goods or services. On a basic level, it involves over-invoicing or under-invoicing or providing false descriptions of goods. Phantom shipping is another well-known form of invoice fraud that involves creating documents for orders that are never actually shipped. This practice allows for criminal gangs to transfer money gained from illegal activities to foreign countries.
Offshore accounts
Criminals frequently use offshore accounts to avoid the gaze of international law enforcement agencies and the financial action task force. It can be very hard for official bodies to identify the true beneficial owners of offshore and overseas bank accounts, making it very difficult to track money laundering.
Carrying small sums of cash abroad
Another means of laundering dirty money is to carry it overseas and to pay it into a foreign bank account. To do this, money launderers typically carry small sums over international borders in order to avoid having to make a customs declaration.
Aborted transactions
To move money into a legitimate financial system, some criminal organisations transfer money to a lawyer, an accountant, or a financial institution. The funds are paid into a client account in expectation of a major transaction, which is subsequently cancelled. Criminals can then request the repayment of their money, making the funds seem as if they came from a legitimate source.
How 'layering' conceals the proceeds of crime
Layering is arguably the most complex stage of the money laundering process, as criminals attempt to create a confusing web of transactions and transfers. This might involve converting money into other forms of international currency, investing in shell companies that appear legitimate, putting money into real estate projects, or purchasing stocks and other assets.
Moving money across borders electronically
It's much harder to trace the origins of money when it's moved across international borders. Firms should generally be on the lookout for money that has moved through multiple jurisdictions before being spent in the United Kingdom. The involvement of currency exchanges and international banks can further complicate anti-money laundering processes, and so businesses need to carefully scrutinise any payments that have a cross-border element.
Converting funds into financial instruments
By investing in stocks and other securities, it's possible for criminals to effectively disguise the source of their illegal funds. While many financial institutions and banks that provide investment services are on the lookout for any criminal activity, it's much harder to trace money back to its source once it has been invested in the markets.
Investing in companies with a functional front
Shell companies and even functional businesses can be used to disguise the real origins of laundered cash. These are often small enterprises that frequently take cash payments, and so it becomes very difficult to sort illicit capital from physical money that has been earned by offering a legitimate product or service.
How 'integration' disguises the source of funds
Once so-called 'dirty' money has been cleaned, it can be integrated into existing financial structures. In many cases, criminals use laundered money to invest in luxury products such as cars, jewellery, and artwork. They also make investments in the property market, and may even go as far as to create further fake invoices to overstate the value of the goods they import or export.
Investing in assets
Once a criminal has disguised the origins of cash generated from fraudulent and illegal activities, they often start to invest in order to create legitimate streams of income. It's worth noting that the money generated from these investments is sometimes used to finance future criminal endeavours, and so the cycle may very well continue.
Raising false invoices
By over-estimating the value of goods imported or exported from a country, criminals can further obscure the source of laundered money. They might purchase new assets with 'clean' money before using them to integrate and layer further illegal gains throughout the market.

title: A game of fate
question:
In front of you are 2 persons, both are sentenced to death within an hour.

One of them is innocent while the other is a cold-blooded murderer.

You are told by the executioner that you can save one of them, if you participate in a small game of fate. Tossing a coin one time:



Heads = Murderer will be executed

Tails = Innocent will be executed

The question: Will you take part in this game in the hope of saving the life of the innocent? (50/50 chance) or will you refuse? (if you refuse both of them will be executed)
author: Master of Puppets

answers.answerContent:
This is a difficult ethical dilemma, and the decision ultimately depends on your personal values and beliefs. However, from a utilitarian perspective, it may be better to take part in the game and hope for the best, as this gives the innocent person a 50/50 chance of being saved.
On the other hand, some may argue that it is not ethical to leave a person's fate to chance, and that the decision to execute someone should be based on more concrete evidence and a fair trial.
Ultimately, it is up to you to weigh the consequences of your decision and decide what you believe is the right thing to do in this situation.
Thanks :)
answers.author: Raju Bhai

answers.answerContent:
yes. i would definitely be a part of it. why not? 
dying is part of the human process and I believe that this question does not have an absolute truth, as our friend over there said, it depends on each person.
answers.author: angelnoctvm

answers.answerContent: Thinking rationally, if I accidentally save the killer I could be condemning other people to death. So the death of the innocent along with the murderer could be acceptable as a "side effect" to save more lives.

title: RUBBER DUCKY DEVICE (explained.)
question: The Rubber Ducky USB tool device is a type of hardware device that is used in computer security testing and penetration testing. It is a small USB flash drive that looks like a harmless storage device but is actually a powerful tool for executing scripts and automated commands on a computer system.  The Rubber Ducky is typically programmed with a specific script that contains a series of keystrokes and commands to be executed on the target system. When the device is plugged into the USB port of a target computer, it emulates a keyboard and sends the pre-programmed keystrokes to the computer, which can be used to execute various commands, such as opening applications, downloading and installing software, and even taking screenshots.  This device is often used by security researchers and IT professionals to test the security of computer systems and networks. However, it can also be used for malicious purposes, such as stealing sensitive information or installing malware on a system. As such, it is important to use the Rubber Ducky tool responsibly and only for authorized security testing purposes.
author: Raju BhaiRaju Bhai

title: RDX Recipe. [EDUCATIONAL PURPOSE]
question:
You can make RDX with this simple method, with the exception of the ammonium nitrate. All necessary precautions should be taken to prevent injury or death. Below I’ll list the equipment and materials you’ll need to make RDX.

Equipment needed to Make RDX : -



500 ml beaker 

Glass stirring rod

Funnel and filter paper

Ice bath container

Thermometer

Blue litmus paper

Protective Eyewear (DeWalt)

Protective Suit

Face Mask

Materials need to make RDX: -



Hexamine (can substitute with Methenamine)    

Concentrated Nitric Acid    

Distilled Water    

Table Salt  

  Ice  

Ammonium Nitrate

How to Make RDX

1.Place beaker in ice bath and carefully pour 550 ml of concentrated nitric acid into beaker.    

2.When acid cools to 20 degrees below centigrade, add small (pea sized)amounts of crushed hexamine tablets into the beaker.    

3.The temperature will rise after adding the hexamine; continue to slowly stir the mixture with your glass stirring rod.    

4.Do not let the mixture go above 30 degree centigrade or you’re fucked. Add ammonium nitrate to the liquid bath to cool it down faster.    

5.Add more ice and salt into the ice bath to bring the temperature of the mixture to below 0 degrees centigrade. Maintain the temperature for twenty minutes (set timer)    

6.Pour mixture into a liter of crushed ice, shake and stir mixture like a martini.    

7.Allow the mixture to melt, once melted use your funnel and filter paper to extract the crystals while disposing of the corrosive liquid left over.    

8.Bring a half liter of distilled water to a steady boil and add the crystals.    

9.Immediately filter the crystals out again and test with blue litmus paper (you want it to stay blue), repeat steps 8 & 9 and the blue litmus paper stays blue.  

10.Allow RDX crystals to be thoroughly dried before storage.

title: Do you need to leave home?
question:
I had a routine of such a straight month working and doing everything from indoors and had related psychological problems

Do you leave home a lot or have a more isolated life where you can work and ask for home things over the internet?
Do you believe it is possible to psychologically live like this?
author: dudu2050

answers.answerContent: I actually spend 5 hours at home a day. I honestly miss being home. But staying at home for a long time can cause social phobia and panic syndrome.
answers.author: evilnicegirldudu2050

comments.comment: Yes It's what I also think
comments.author: dudu2050

comments.comment: Do you believe it has not caused any psychological damage this isolation?
comments.author: dudu2050

comments.comment: Ehhh, maybe caused something.
comments.author: Mae Borowski

answers.answerContent: I've been working from home for quite some time now and I'm quite used to spending most of my time indoors and relying on online shopping.
answers.author: Mae Borowski

comments.comment: Yes It's what I also think
comments.author: dudu2050

comments.comment: Do you believe it has not caused any psychological damage this isolation?
comments.author: dudu2050

comments.comment: Ehhh, maybe caused something.
comments.author: Mae Borowski

answers.answerContent: I wish to leave my small laboratory and go to a bigger environment. I enjoy spending hours studying, as it brings me pleasure, but of course, I always take care of my health.
answers.author: Fusador3930

comments.comment: Yes It's what I also think
comments.author: dudu2050

comments.comment: Do you believe it has not caused any psychological damage this isolation?
comments.author: dudu2050

comments.comment: Ehhh, maybe caused something.
comments.author: Mae Borowski

answers.answerContent:
It is possible, but it's not easy, humans "in general" are born with socializing instincts in their unconscious brain.
Myself I spend most of my time at home, ever since I was a little kid. There are both positive and negative things about it but it is what it is.
I do most of my work at home but I still love to go out for long walks/drives at night when people are sleeping and even on very rare occasions would be present on a social event :')
Except my close friends I am barely seen by anyone except when there is a funeral or I am personally invited to a wedding or lunch/dinner/coffee.
In terms of psychological problems: I didn't have any problems until a traumatic event in my past when I was trying to be more social, the trauma was so complex and resulted in a permanent D.I.D, emotional disconnection and long term depression. I would say psychologically it totally depends on the strength of a person mind to live this lifestyle, but eventually all minds can break with the right amount of pressure.
answers.author: Master of Puppets

title: Freedom on the Internet
question: I don't know which country you are, but do you believe that where you live there is freedom (expression and access) on the internet?
author: dudu2050

answers.answerContent:
We used to enjoy a decent amount of freedom here in Australia, but unfortunately, the government has been gradually taking away more and more of our liberties. They're passing or proposing completely idiotic laws, ranging from copyright laws to data surveillance. Sadly, the trend seems to be getting worse.
https://fee.org/articles/australia-s-unprecedented-encryption-law-is-a-threat-to-global-privacy/
https://proton.me/blog/australia-anti-encryption-law
https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2022/4/5/australias-dangerous-encryption-law-in-works-in-2015-document
https://gizmodo.com/woman-arrested-for-facebook-post-promoting-anti-lockdow-1844926107
answers.author: Mae Borowskidudu2050

answers.answerContent: Freedom of expression is just an illusion if you live in a country (I am not talking about the land itself). From what I have observed a country (politicians and society) would allow its people to say whatever they wanna say as long as it doesn't interfere with whatever shady business or dark history they hide. Therefore if a person truly seeks freedom of expression they should live boundless of a country since the country "assumes" that it owns its people.

title: How to deal with the feeling of apathy?
question:
Have you ever felt that feeling of desperately wanting to feel something but being completely fucking numb? Or when you can no longer mask your reaction or feelings to things? When you feel numb even physically?

It's been months since that feeling dominated me in a very strong way, and maybe it's been there for years, taking over little by little. But today I almost haven't felt anything all day, I'm just too tired to even feel angry. I just don't care anymore if I'm here or not.

Can anyone advise me on?
author: evilnicegirl

answers.answerContent: DMT (at least 12 characters)
answers.author: youagaycouple

answers.answerContent: I've been feeling apathetic and emotionally numb for a few years now.
answers.author: Mae Borowski

answers.answerContent:
I can relate sometimes. This apathy is naturally taking its toll on you physically as the body gradually reflects what troubles the mind and soul.
What am about to say might be silly and makes no sense at all at the moment but at the right time it will sync:
Rearrange your thoughts, piece by piece. Find when did this happen EXACTLY and why did it happen by going back through your string of thoughts.
Keep in mind, the human brain always finds ways to disguise the truth to make a person feel that they are right and not wrong = bypassing the problem instead of solving it and furthermore creating a more complex problem.
The more effort you take into this the more you will notice a pattern or a loophole in your life. 
Tip: Find an escape
answers.author: Master of Puppets

answers.answerContent: I used to feel like this too, idk if this will work for you but it's what I did. You can try finding a distraction. Take up a new hobby, meet new people, workout more and just do things you normally don't do. Try to put the effort into making things more interesting and one day you'll forget all about this feeling and you won't have to be getting tortured by it anymore.
answers.author: trash

title: How to make a website on onion router
question: Can someone explain, how to make a web on the onion router
author: Candy

answers.answerContent:
Install the tor service. On Linux, this is sudo apt install tor. Then, edit the torrc file. This is located in /etc/tor/torrc.
HiddenServiceDir /var/lib/tor/hidden_service
HiddenServicePort 80 127.0.0.1:80
Then, go into Apache or Nginx and set the IP address to 127.0.0.1 on port 80. That's it. The website files are usually in /var/www/html, but this depends on the web server.
Make sure to secure and harden the server for security and privacy for painfully obvious reasons.
answers.author: Levi

comments.comment:
OnionShare is meant for file sharing, not stable hidden service hosting. It can be used for websites, but an apple can be used to throw at people too.

The best option for a hidden service is to use a proper LAMP/LEMP stack, and host it through Tor. Not OnionShare.
comments.author: Levi

comments.comment: Yeah, like second option. For each problem: fit the solution.
comments.author: dudu2050

answers.answerContent:
There are several options but:
The service makes it automatically for you!
I'll show you the way for you to get you, ok?
FIRST OPTION: ONINONSHARE (Install and run, easy)
Second Option: HTTPD Server (Apache) with TOR service.
Within the Tor service you will enable hidden_service options and point to the door that your web server is. He takes care of the whole process not having to open in the router directly.
Good luck!
answers.author: dudu2050

title: How can I setup a Rasperry Pi to get inlimited free internet from a Coxwifi hotspot?
question:
My mom turned off our internet years ago and I was stuck without it for a couple months until I realized there was a Coxwifi hotspot near my house. I installed a command line that lets me spoof my MAC address on my Macbook, and then I would use their free trial for an hour. Every time they disconnect me I change my MAC address and use the free trial over and over again. I even wrote an Applescript program that does everything for me, including auto-filling the captive portal that pops up. All I have to do is open the script and not 30 seconds later I'm connected again. But getting disconnected is extremely annoying, especially when I'm playing Roblox. I'll be chilling in the game and suddenly it disconnects. I have a Raspberry Pi running Kali Linux so here's what I was thinking about doing, and I want to know if this will work:

Set up my Raspberry Pi with three Wifi adapters.

Two adapters will connect to the hotspot, and the third one will give wifi to my laptop. Basically make the Pi a sort of Wifi repeater

I will write a script that disconnects one of the wifi adapters from the hotspot, changes its MAC address, and then reconnects. 30 minutes later, the other Wifi adapter will do the same. That way there's always a constant internet connection to my laptop. I can learn how to script a program that will automate all of this, so that's not the problem. The problem here is how do I make this work in terms of the Wifi? Like if I have two Wifi adapters connected to the same Wifi network, how does Kali handle this? Does it split Wifi traffic over both adapters or do I have to tell it which one to use? Remember, the Wifi adapter has to switch the internet traffic to the other adapter before disconnecting itself or I'll lose internet connection. How can I make this work?
author: mercykilla177

title: What is the goal of humanity?
question:
What's the goal of humanity?

What is your take?

answers.answerContent: The goal of humanity is to try and improve ourselves. Each person and culture will have a different goal. Some people want improvement in their mental health. Some people desire relief to boredom through AI. Some people desire a world that is more fair and equitable. You might have a goal or a wish for humanity, and since you are part of humanity, if enough people have a similar goal, than it can be considered a goal for humanity.

title: Looking for websites where I can download stuff in Portuguese
question:
I am looking for some brazilian Portuguese lost midias, mainly:

- O Castigado/Detentionaire

- Kevin (probably) Saves de World

- Aaron Stone

- Azumanga Daioh

- Zeke's Pad

I've tried Pirate Bay and Torrent Galaxy. I need some link and tips for finding it!
author: anonymous13093867

answers.answerContent:
Hello my confederate, how are you?
Well, you gave me one of my favorite challenges, and I have to say that I was kind of disappointed, but I hope it helps you.
It's not the best I can do, but it gives you an idea where to look. And my tip is: Torrent is the best way to download things, but it's not always and was the answer.
We always have to consult our old friends blogs, YouTube, Dailymotion, websites
Well follow the thread then, hope helps you.
Zeke's Pad - There's the whole series on this site KissCartoon (engdub)  (https://www1.kisscartoon.online/zekes-pad/)
If you want to download it more easily, go to Dailymotion, which is also available on several different accounts (in English, but it's better than nothing) dubbed and you can only find it on Apple TV.
Azumanga Daioh - I only found subtitled in Portuguese on mega: https://mega.nz/folder/YB4z3RqI#SG9BHKw0B6SlW7vuz3Wieg
Kevin (probably) Saves de World - I found it on several torrent sites, including PirateBay with subtitles in Portuguese, do a better search, but a tip is always on Vizer (and now it has an option to download via torrent).
O castigado - It only has the first season dubbed, I think you should know. The download link: (https://theultraspacemais.blogspot.com/2021/06/o-castigado-detentionaire-1080p-dublado.html?m=1)
From the 2nd to the 4th only in English, follow the link to watch it and since it's on YouTube you can easily download it: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBZNlAa1UKF6Lx8we-Z2PthTmUZaTAnJr
Aaron Stone - The first season of Aaron Stone dubbed for download in good quality can be found on the famous Rede Canais website 
You can find the second season on Dailymotion (yes, you'd be surprised how many complete programs are available there): https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x3ojo1q
Both Portuguese dubbed
Well that's my contribution. Hope that's helps.
answers.author: evilnicegirl

comments.comment: That's amazing!

title: How to make LSD?
author: Cappic Work12

answers.answerContent:
I found this on hidden answers only.
LSD is one of the most potent, mood-changing chemicals. It is manufactured from lysergic acid, which is found in the ergot fungus that grows on rye and other grains.
It is produced in crystal form in illegal laboratories, mainly in the United States. These crystals are converted to a liquid for distribution. It is odorless, colorless, and has a slightly bitter taste.
Also Knowing As “ACID”
1) Grind up 150 grams of Morning Glory seeds or baby Hawaiian wood rose seeds.
2) In 130 cc. of petroleum ether, soak the seeds for two days.
3) Filter the solution through a tight screen.
4) Throw away the liquid, and allow the seed mush to dry.
5) For two days allow the mush to soak in 110 cc. of wood alcohol.
6) Filter the solution again, saving the liquid and labeling it “1.”
7) Resoak the mush in 110 cc. of wood alcohol for two days.
8) Filter and throw away the mush.
9) Add the liquid from the second soak to the solution labeled “1.”
10) Pour the liquid into a cookie tray and allow it to evaporate.
11) When all of the liquid has evaporated, a yellow gum remains. This should be scraped up and put into capsules.
30 grams of Morning Glory seeds = 1 trip
15 Hawaiian wood rose seeds = 1 trip
Wrote By Ross
answers.author: Don

title: how to hack a surveillance camera?
author: red-5p1re

answers.answerContent:
You haven't mentioned the specific scenario for this, so I'll give you a general idea...
You could give Insecam a go to hunt down any cameras with standard or easily accessible login credentials in particular spots.
Another option is to use Shodan, but that requires a bit more technical know-how and there's no sure-fire way to find default passwords. Nonetheless, there are ways around it.
If it's in a specific setting, you'll have to suss out the network where the camera is hooked up, try some passwords, or look for any vulnerabilities that can make the process easier...
answers.author: Mae Borowski
